I have a very busy Schedule and my camera broke unexpectedly just now that I'm going to travel, hence the purchase but I need it before an specific date(really son) the color that I chose will take to long because its not available right away so when I contacted the seller they offer me a different color if that's ok with and also offered to pays for the rush and let me tell you thus it my first purchase with them, no history whatsoever and they are taking that loss so I can be satisfied, so I think that that matters too and if there is a product that it is not what u expected it to be just talk to your seller first or contact mine because they are great. thank u.

Reviews.Title: I'm dissappointed
Reviews.Author: Royal Ryser
Reviews.Content: The screen is very hard to see out-of-doors, even in cloudy weather.  The shutter button is in an awkward location.

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures and Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Brad Weinfeld
Reviews.Content: Took this Camera to Spain and got great shots.  The CMOS processor made shooting in low light possible.  The zoom is amazing.  If this was a camera of just a few months ago with that kind of zoom it would never fit in your pocket.

Reviews.Title: Lens error
Reviews.Author: rd2000
Reviews.Content: Normally I don't write reviews. However I thought I should share about this product. I have a Nikon D7000 camera. I use it very extensively. My family planned an international travel for about 8 weeks. I thought we will buy a smaller aim and shoot camera for this travel. I ordered this camera. It was received on time. Amazon has an excellent delivery service.  After opening the package I realized that this doesn't have a separate battery charger. The battery charge complete indicator wasn't really doing a good job.We took this camera on our travel. We used this for couple of times. One of the issue I observed is, it is taking pretty long time to save the image and get ready for the next shot..When we used the third time, we were able to take a few snaps and closed the camera. A few minutes later when I tried to open, it started giving a lens error. I couldn't open the camera and use for any purposes, like preview the images already taken etc., the camera was dead.I wouldn't recommend this camera for anyone.I used several other aim and shoot cameras, they are very rough and tough use. Never encountered this kind of issue with them. This is a very weird problem.I checked my account to see if I can return this back to Amazon. However it just surpassed the number of days for return. I will have to contact the manufacturer for refund of this camera. .

Reviews.Title: simply garbage
Reviews.Author: heath
Reviews.Content: Stay away from the Nikon S9300 camera and it's technology. The camera freeze's, lens sometimes gets stuck full out, it takes moving shots slower than our iphone 4. Seriously - our iphone has more performance for action shots than this junkie camera! Missed so many shots it's not funny. Camera is very slow to focus up to 3 seconds, with a 4 second before next shot is ready ( which does not work for sports ). Camera is going back. Yes, firmware was upgraded, all features that where unnecessary turned off to help speed, fast and approved memory was used. It's just a bad product. Flash is located in a bad position, battery life is under a hundred 4 meg photos ( or a few dozen power on/off cycles with only 40 photos ) and a few 1 minute videos before battery is dead.run away from this one!

Reviews.Title: poor product and even worse customer service
Reviews.Author: Spunky Crankypants
Reviews.Content: Nikon COOLPIX S9200 16 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 18x Zoom NIKKOR ED Glass Lens and Full HD 1080p Video (Black)I purchased the Nikon COOLPIX S9200 two months ago and was pretty happy with my purchase the first month. It took pretty decent pictures, for the most part. Outside pictures turned out pretty darn good and I really enjoyed experimenting with the various effects (selective color etc.). I'm a total beginner when it comes to photography and this camera SEEMED like it was going to be perfect for me to learn with. The first pictures that I took in less than perfect light turned out blurry to the point that you couldn't even tell what was in them. I read the instruction manual carefully thinking that I must be doing something wrong because of Nikon's advertisement for this camera. They claim that you are able to take perfect pictures with practically no light. The camera didn't last long enough for me to figure out if it was something I was doing or if the camera was junk. A couple of weeks ago I started having issues with the camera not focusing on what I was trying to take a picture of and it was getting hot after only having it on for a few minutes. The camera froze up and the screen displayed a lens error message and shut off a few days ago. I have tried taking the battery out and leaving it out with no luck. I called Nikon and was instructed that I would have to pay shipping and send it either UPS or FedEx to LA (I live in Kansas) to have it looked at. IF they determined that it was not because of something I did then they would fix it. After reading numerous reviews on Amazon and other websites from customers who have had the same problem and have shipped their cameras and are still waiting to get them back months later, I do not hold out much hope that the problem will be resolved.I would recommend that you save your money and purchase a camera from a company with a better reputation. The camera is only so-so. Outside it takes pretty good pictures, if it actually works that is. Inside it doesn't do so well. I can't really comment much on the camera because it started failing before I really had a chance to give it a good road test. I don't know for sure if I just got a bad camera or if it's the camera in general. I've read reviews where people were pretty pleased which is why I bought mine to begin with. Unfortunately I wasn't so lucky. Nikon's customer service is extremely poor, the customer is required to pay shipping to send the item in for repair when it is under warranty and from what some other customers have said, they have been waiting months to get their cameras back and are still waiting. I'm currently researching other cameras and will be purchasing either a Canon or a Sony this weekend.

Reviews.Title: nikon s9200
Reviews.Author: JClo
Reviews.Content: I like this compact and powerful camera, many great features, but the pop-up flash can get in the way when you are holding it

Reviews.Title: An OK camera
Reviews.Author: RH
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera quickly without checking into options and I now wish I would have waited.  The picture quality can be good, but you need to make sure all settings are correct and it is easy to have blurry photos.  As many have said, the placement of the flash is annoying.  I am constantly blocking it from popping up.  I cannot figure out how to turn off the sounds.  When the camera is turned on, it makes a bell sound.  Everyone turns to look at me when I am trying to get pictures of my kid's concerts at school.  Also, when it is dark, a red light shines.  Another distraction that I cannot seem to turn off.  The on/off button is very small and recessed, therefore, it is difficult to operate.  I use my fingernail and can imagine it would be very frustrating for men with larger fingers.  On the positive side, it has a good zoom and high megapixals for the price.  It is small enough to throw into a purse or bag, which I wanted for family vacations.  It will do for a while, but I will do more research for the next camera.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera
Reviews.Author: C. Howell
Reviews.Content: I use my camera extensively as I take pictures all day (approx. 1,000 or more in a run) doing house inspections. This camera is well designed, light, responsive to low light situations, and hasn't let me down yet. I love Nikon products and due to the use and abuse I put a camera through, I go through one a year, if not more. But I am a heavy use with lots of abuse (drops and beatings from crawling through areas, etc.) so for the camera to last it would have to be shockproof, etc. But for a run of the mill use - this is an amazing camera. Pictures are clear - no focus issues with auto focus on board - built in flash and so many features it is impossible to list them all. I would recommend Nikon all the time!

Reviews.Title: It does what I bought it for
Reviews.Author: John R. Phillips "Dick"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a small camera that I could easily carry in a pocket but still get reasonable quality images.  This camera does what I wanted it to do and seems to do it well.  I've gotten spoiled by my D200 and Nikon V1 as to what they will do but neither is a pocket camera and this one can be along with me as easily as my cell phone and it takes much better photos than my cell phone does.I like the wide range of the zoom lens and the sensitivity of the sensor.  I like that it uses an SD card.  I've already mentioned its small size.I am not fond of the shutter delay but that is standard with this kind of camera.  I miss having a viewfinder as the image screen is harder to use especially in bright light conditions.  I don't like that the battery has to be charged in the camera but found there are third party chargers that allow me to charge my extra battery outside the camera.I especially liked the price of $123.45.  Look at the way those numbers progress!

Reviews.Title: Great camera except speed of shots.
Reviews.Author: MLLOKC "mllokc"
Reviews.Content: My only complainant is that it is slow to recover for the next picture while it saves your shot. Otherwise it is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Nice but has little things I don't like.
Reviews.Author: Charles S. Reed "audiomook"
Reviews.Content: This camera is very similar to the Fuji F770 except for the GPS which is on the S9300.  The thing I like is the dynamic range of the pictures.  I don't like the flash that pops up in some modes any time in low light.  I harder to handle than the Fuji and the mode selector is so easy to change that it changes just with a nudge of your finger.  Like I was at the cemetery doing findagrave stuff and I had changed the mode from auto to soft mode.  If you want good picture though it is not a bad buy, and really what is a camera for anyway.

Reviews.Title: Longtime Nikon user
Reviews.Author: Justine Chelette
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace the S8100 that my husband broke.  So far, it's working out great.  I have a Nikon D3100 that I use, but I always like to have a point and shoot for when we're out and on the run.  It takes great pictures, and is very similar to the Nikon S8100 that I was replacing.  The zoom is a bit better, it has more MP, and the menu workings/navigation are still the same.  Other than the different placement of the shutter button, I feel like I'm using the same camera, which is nice.  The only thing I have trouble with (just a matter of getting used to it, not a deal breaker or anything), is that you have to depress the on/off button for longer than my old camera.  So it's not an instant power on like my old one, which sometimes leaves me fumbling when I'm trying to whip my camera out in a hurry to catch something.  But overall, a great camera, for a really good price!

Reviews.Title: Convenient pocket camera with great pictures
Reviews.Author: John S Kutzlo
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera.  I bought it for it's compactness and quality of pictures.  It fits conveniently in my pants pocket and it's just so easy to point and shoot a photo.  Great zoom.  I really don't use the GPS feature.  Sometimes I hold the camera by it the carrying strap and the corner of the camera.  Unfortunately I tend to hit the video record button from time to time. Perhaps the record button should be relocated.  A more textured finish might help secure a better grip when holding the camera.  As I mentioned earlier, I carry the camera in my pants pocket which can be detrimental to the camera if not stored in the carrying case.  I've managed to damage the viewing screen  and the zoom lens.  The battery life is somewhat short but I now carry an extra one.  Again, great little camera that meets my needs very well!

Reviews.Title: One of the better point and shoots
Reviews.Author: Mont Claire
Reviews.Content: Having had a couple of other brands, such as Panasonic and Sony, this is my favorite. Easy to use, menu is not complicated, really not much to dislike. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars, is that on occasion, some photos are soft, however this is a common 'problem' with many brands of point and shoot cameras once in awhile. Given that is not an SLR, I think this is an excellent product, and I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Needed small digital camera.
Reviews.Author: Jo Beverly Fain "kindleluvr"
Reviews.Content: I have grandchildren in two states.  I needed a compact camera to carry in my purse.  I find this one easy to use and love the size!

Reviews.Title: made rather goofy
Reviews.Author: Kelly D. Martin
Reviews.Content: takes good pictures,but the Flash is in an incredibly stupid location and the trigger isnt much better. no viewfinder only a screen and that pretty much sucks

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Barry W.
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera with the expectation that I was getting a great deal on trailing edge technology but after using it for the first four days of my trip, I had made up my mind to return it as soon as I could. Problem number one: it sucks the life out of the battery. I burned through two batteries in four days and as I neglected to bring the USB cord with me (my bad), I could not recharge. I did bring the charger, but that is merely an external transformer. My wife's Panasonic Lumix on the other hand has a charger that charges the battery outside the camera and more to the point, we never needed her second battery even though we used her camera as much if not more than the Nikon for over a week. As to the 18x zoom, it seems most of it is digital - which means that without a tripod - not something you normally bring on vacation, most zoomed shots are virtually impossible to get. Then there is the poor reading of light in depth of field. No matter which setting I tried, this camera did not shoot what my eye saw when shooting through narrow Italian streets with great green fields and sunny skies visible on the horizon. In short: Not The Camera I Was Hoping For. I sent it back.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made
Reviews.Author: Ricky
Reviews.Content: Camera broke after several uses....and seems strange that this brand level would be so unreliable.Something so simple should simply work!

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Andrea Vaughn
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to receive this camera and it has not disappointed me.  Takes great photos and has all kinds of photo options.

Reviews.Title: Wouldnt recommend
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: Slow to turn on and off. Compact camera like this should be ready to go at an instances notice. Picture quality is great!

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera!
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: I was worried I didn't have enough knowledge about camera's to purchase one online but this one is great!  Takes super clear and fast pictures and zooms in so amazing.  Much better of a camera than what it cost me!  It will be great for studying abroad for me this summer, can't wait.

Reviews.Title: OK product
Reviews.Author: Jorge Lanza
Reviews.Content: Quality of pictures is good but there are a few things about the camera I don't like:- Can't see the pictures without opening the lens- You need to connect the camera to the plug to charge it. Can't take the battery off- Flach position is not ergonomicAll in all, an OK product but not the best point and shoot camera in the market

Reviews.Title: Great camera at a fantastic price. Was $329 last year, amazing features all i wanted in a compact camera.
Reviews.Author: D. Hunter
Reviews.Content: Great camera at a fantastic price. Was $329 last year, amazing features all i wanted in a compact camera,1080 video.

Reviews.Title: Very cute! Good camera!
Reviews.Author: Leonel Muniz
Reviews.Content: Nice appearance, modern, with good features. Good quality of image. Maybe, it could take better photos in darklight. Anyway good value for money!

Reviews.Title: Good, not great
Reviews.Author: vincent mangia
Reviews.Content: Pics and settings are fine, but i found its gets slow in taking lots of pics in sequence. Basically, the time it takes to get to snap the next picture. Sometimes when turning it on, it doesn't want to focus, and you have to tap the shutter button to get it to clear up. All in all, i've had much better cameras that were cheaper.

Reviews.Title: ok for the price
Reviews.Author: PoppaDew
Reviews.Content: You really have to hold absolutely still when taking the pic or it comes out blurry. Takes too long to focus!!

Reviews.Title: not this one
Reviews.Author: D. White
Reviews.Content: Zoom gets stuck but that's not the worst.  Dead battery light flashes every 1-2 photos.  Take the batteries out put them back in, get 1-2 photos maybe.  Take them out, put new ones in, maybe get 1-2 photos, then dead battery warning again.  Just give up and get rid of the camera.  That was the first time out trying to use it.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: S. Arokiasamy
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I love to make pictures. I am not a professional. This camera gives perfect pictures. Good!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Lori Smith
Reviews.Content: love the special effects feature that you can set before the picture taking or change the picture after you've taken it!  Great size, weight and love the red colour!  Takes great pictures and easy to take with you!

Reviews.Title: Nikkon camera
Reviews.Author: Victoria O. Calderon
Reviews.Content: I wanted a small camera for my husband and when I came across this one I knew it was perfect!  Easy to use and great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Monica
Reviews.Content: This camera is a little bulky and the flash is annoying because you put your hand above it. Despite that the camera is great and the quality of the photos are fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S9300 Review
Reviews.Author: Taryn
Reviews.Content: Product was in great condition and delievered on time. My only complaint would be about my package; it came with a fairly big dent on one side, but luckily it didn't affect the camera.

Reviews.Title: cool
Reviews.Author: Sadiq Majeed
Reviews.Content: I should have gotten info on the blurring of shots since this camera did not have that feature. My hands being big often times would get in the way of flash/lens/mic. Maybe sometime later I will upgrade to the S9300.

Reviews.Title: nikon S9200
Reviews.Author: ernie cox jr
Reviews.Content: the focus works when it wants to.  takes sharp fotos if and when it focus. It has a nice feel to it, and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Best Digital Camera I've Owned
Reviews.Author: Christy
Reviews.Content: Great price, excellent camera, easy to use.  The size is comfortable to use and carry.  Instruction manual easy to use. Had to get use initially to the pop up flash since I was used to putting my finger on the top of the camera.  Other than that, no problems.

Reviews.Title: Love Amazon.com
Reviews.Author: David Scoffield "03dg"
Reviews.Content: Ordered this from Amazon.com with free shipping.  I got it the next day. Less than 24 hours and free! You can't beat that. That's why I love Amazon.com.  I'm still waiting for two other items I ordered from different sellers.The Camera is great. Takes excellent pictures and movies.  As other reviewers have mentioned, the flash pops up under your left finger, but you soon get used to it.  This model (s9200)  doesn't have the GPS or the compass feature,like the s9300 but I consider those to be unnecessary bells and whistles. I would suggest you order a case with it if you buy one and an SD card, but all in all this is an excellent camera with very sharp Nikon glass and a  powerful zoom at a very reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Nikon
Reviews.Author: Norma L.
Reviews.Content: I chose this camera because of the name brand Nikon which is one of the best cameras in existance.  The quality of the pictures are amazing and never fails to give you that crisp, perfect color in the photos.  I would recommend this camera to anyone and it is very convenient to carry with you on vacation.

Reviews.Title: It is nice
Reviews.Author: wolkahn
Reviews.Content: It is really nice machine, it takes nice pictures. The biggest problem i have is when recording a video, you should not zoom in or out. Because lens has this weird sound and it blocks other sounds and you can not hear other than this buzzing sound. But other then its nice machine

Reviews.Title: ?defective
Reviews.Author: Hagop Tabakian
Reviews.Content: overall the performance was OK, but frequently when I turn it off, the lens would not retract!! I have to take the battery out and back in for it to retract.

Reviews.Title: Nikon S9200
Reviews.Author: William Segal
Reviews.Content: great camera - I've had a number of digital cameras and this one far exceeds them all. I was looking for a camera that performs well in low light and it met all my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S9300
Reviews.Author: Kenneth E Huffaker
Reviews.Content: Camera works great and pix are great! The inconvenience I found is with the 'POP UP' flash. Many times I find my finger holding it down because it does not pop up until the the button is pressed to take the photo. I'm still trying to get accustomed to keeping my finger out of the way because that is where holding the camera feels most natural.If the pop up release allowed the flash to extend when powering up the camera, then there would not be a problem,for me anyway!I do recommend this camera if you like to enlarge your photos.

Reviews.Title: It did not meet my needs.
Reviews.Author: hank baier
Reviews.Content: The camera is hard to use in bright sunlight and does not focus well when you use the zoom lens.

Reviews.Title: Not the best...
Reviews.Author: The DeVillers "Kzoo"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera (not at Amazon) for too much money. I have a Nikon SLR (D70s) and it continues to work very nicely.The battery cover latch has a hair trigger, will open if you just brush against it - I ended up putting a piece of electrical tape over it to keep it from unlatching.The function knob turns too easily. It is very easy to simply nudge the wheel and end up in a different shooting mode.The pop up flash bothers me, but it does take good flash pictures.The picture quality is great -IF- you pause during the shot half way on the shutter button and wait for the green boxes to appear.Video quality is pretty nice. It takes a moment or two to start and then to stop the video recording. Not real intuitive controls and they are poorly placed.Kills batteries pretty fast, but most of the point & shoots I have had do also. Get a (not Nikon, much cheaper) spare as a back up.Look for a Canon equivalent, may be a better camera...

Reviews.Title: Great camera proves size doesnt matter. Its a big camera in a small form
Reviews.Author: Kim Kelly
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I was in the market for a new one. After several sites and a whole bunch of research, I decided to go with a Nikon so when I read the reviews on this one, I decided the rating was one of the highest i had seen for a camera. I got it on amazon cheaper then anywhere else it arrived super fast and took only minutes to get up and going. I love the camera it takes great pics and video.The only CON i have is where you hold it if your not carefull your finger will be on top of the flash when it  pops up. Just readjust your hand and all will be good

Reviews.Title: Very good camera at this price, suitable when travelling
Reviews.Author: Haijiang Chen
Reviews.Content: Well, the 18X zoom is more than enough for general need. I bought this product just before i went to Florida, and that is where i tested the camera. It is small and light, very convenient to  carry on. The only thing I felt uncomfortable was that most of the time (that would be ~8 hours) it shown the battery was full, then dramatically it had to be powered off because of no power. If you take two batteries with you, the power won't be a problem.

Reviews.Title: product is great!! easy to use and love the extras!!
Reviews.Author: Dij_Moo "Dij_moo"
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. I love the Macro setting for up close settings which I use a lot. It is easy to use and small enough to take anywhere. The only problem I have is the battery life is kinda short, had to buy an extra battery to take with me on long outdoor trips.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Adam Duzan
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera that captures crystal clear images and seems to focus on what you want in photos!  Great camera, great price!

Reviews.Title: Great value and quality!
Reviews.Author: Cynthia
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for one daughter she loved it so much I bought another one for another daughter. Has great zoom capabilities and the picture resolution is brilliant. Best value for the price! The first one I bought through Best Buy, I got the second one through Amazon (not too much difference in price) but the camera was delivered quickly and without a hitch! Made Christmas shopping very convenient.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S9300
Reviews.Author: Andy Killebrew
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price.  Love the panoramic mode. The first was for my daughter, I liked it so much I purchased a second for myself.

Reviews.Title: Not good picture quality
Reviews.Author: Abhinav Gupta
Reviews.Content: Most of the pictures i clicked using this camera are blur.Not good for indoor photography. Will not recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Reaction of taking a picture is too slow
Reviews.Author: Tinryjiang4
Reviews.Content: It took at least 1 2 3 4 5 seconds to allow you to take the another picture. Too long to me.

Reviews.Title: Grey market camera - BUYER BEWAR.no Nikon Warranty
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Taxter "taxman"
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this camera...when you try to register with Nikon they will tell you that the serial number is "not recognized" and the camera "might be grey market"...i called Nikon USA, spoke to a customer service rep, and confirmed that they will not warranty these cameras...I don't know how Amazon is getting away with this...I guess "you get what you pay for"..

Reviews.Title: Nikon Cooplix S9300, Review, Blurry pictures
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: I bought the Nikon Cooplix S9300 because I saw my friend taking superb, defined,good colors pictures. After using it for a while, I found out that the object must stay still and not move an inch in order for the pictures to come out good and not blurry. In other words, if you object move an inch or if it is in motion, the pictures comes out blurry other wise the pictures color saturation are outstanding. The only problem is how can I make my objects stand still without a move for at least 5 seconds when the pictures are taken. I tried to set my camera in the scene setting as sport but the pictures still came out blurry when the person or object in motion. The 18x zoom is outstanding but when I zoomed it to 18x, it was almost impossible to take a good sharp picture without having it blurred. If the 18x is used, the objects must be again stand still and I have to use a tripod because my hands are shaking. I decided to take the Nikon Cooplix S9300 camera back and find other camera that is a little forgiving.

Reviews.Title: Superb and Coolest Pick!!
Reviews.Author: Satish Mhatre
Reviews.Content: It was a great Christmas gift to my daughter.  She loved it.  Utterly, the best camera we have purchased.  Preety high teqh.

Reviews.Title: Good for everyday use
Reviews.Author: fRANK jAHRLING
Reviews.Content: I like this camera, but there are a few things that keep it from being a top-rated one.First, there seems to be too much "stuff". I mean, there seems to be lots of settings and all that, but it's too much to remember. Also, I can't seem to get a fast shutter speed. If the subject is moving, it blurs, even outside. And I don't mean "action", just normal movements. I probably need to try more settings, but the absence of manual controls is annoying.

Reviews.Title: Clear pictures but ergonomically uncomfortable
Reviews.Author: Dorothy Densmore
Reviews.Content: This is an OK camera. The installation CD that came with it did not work and I had to fight through internet downloads to get the computer program set up for use. The pictures are clear and nice, but the camera itself is hard to hold onto.

Reviews.Title: Gray market product
Reviews.Author: robert v. caldwell
Reviews.Content: When I registered this camera online at nikonusa.com they said that they did not recognize the serial number as being valid, and that the camera was more than likely a gray market product. I am very unhappy with amazon, because my camera is probably not covered by a warranty. What are my options as far as exchanging this product are concerned?

Reviews.Title: Great pictures, frustrating camera
Reviews.Author: Jenni
Reviews.Content: I really love the pictures that I get from this camera, but taking them takes too long!!  Many times I have to take the same picture multiple times because it won't focus all the way.  It also takes way too long to focus!  There is also a long wait time to see the picture and then take a new picture. I am in the process of trying to return it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for Price
Reviews.Author: David Oliver Danley
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera a little over a year ago. Over all, for me this has been a great camera and I have gone to parties etc. and put it up against Canons etc. and have gotten " wish I had bought that model instead" responses. The 1080 hd is fantastic but you need a good computer with dual core or duo processor to watch it and good video card. The pictures are decent quality not SLR but hey it's a compact. It does have some great features such as low light shooting adjustment and image stabilization that make it a good choice for non professionals like myself, also editing features. Now, if you want a camera that you can really adjust manually then this is not it. The 9300 has tons of effects and features but...it's all automatic. If you really want to experiment with creative photography , get incredible looking photos through an expensive lens go ahead and get a Nikon SLR entry for around 500 to 800 dollars. It is amazing what the 9300 can do but you really can't experiment like you want to. I use some of the features in ways that they are not intended to produce some of my effects but with an SLR and a good knowledge of photography it's so much Easier. The best feature I like is the panoramic stitching.  With the software from Nikon you can shoot three full pictures one after the other using a helper on the camera that shows a quarter of the previous picture when ready to shoot the next photo (landscape or portrait style) No tripod needed or guessing. Run the pics thru the software and push a button out comes a full 25 to 30 mega pixel panoramic and even I can't detect the stitch lines. I've made photos my friends think I spent hours on in adobe photo shop. Another great one is image stabilization. I took a photo of the moon at dusk at 18 x and after about 4  shots I got a complete clear image. I can see craters etc. on the moon clearly. That's un heard of without a tripod or was a few years ago. Just slightly press the shutter button and the picture will focus and hold still for a few seconds. Of course I had to really brace myself but without a tripod!? I have blog that I post my shots on [...] if you want to check them out. These are reduced size but give a good idea of the quality of the camera. You could Get the 9200 model for less. Doesn't come with GPS and compass stuff which I don't care for. I would recommend this for anyone wanting a solid point and shoot camera with 1080 hd capability.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S9200 16 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 18x Zoom NIKKOR ED
Reviews.Author: Esme
Reviews.Content: This camera was a great special offer. It takes amazing pictures of great clarity, because of the 16 MP glass lens. The  pop-up flash is annoying - better built in, no popup.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: Leon
Reviews.Content: a new and easily controled camera,thanks a lot ,only one should be inproved is battery life,it was so short time when the first time i used it

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Martha
Reviews.Content: I wanted a better Nikon for my trip to Italy, and this camera was great.  High quality video and pictures, including in low light. As you'll frequently see noted, the position of the pop up flash can be irritating, but that's the only flaw I can see.  It was a great upgrade from my previous Nikon Cool Pix and helped me capture some great memories of Italy!

Reviews.Title: Enjoying my camera
Reviews.Author: S. J. Sines "Susan Jean"
Reviews.Content: This camera arrived almost before I ordered it. I was so surprised to find it in my mailbox on a Saturday and I ordered it on a Thursday. It was all in good condition. The only thing was that I thought there was a separate battery charger in it but there was not. I did order one later. I am very pleased with the size of the camera and the ease of using it. The color is very nice and since I had not seen a red camera before, there is no mistaking it as mine, when I put it down.

Reviews.Title: Very Dis appointing
Reviews.Author: CAL
Reviews.Content: This product is very less than what I expected. Start is very slow, It crashes a lot Pictures at high ASA gets blurryVideo quality is NOT very good.

Reviews.Title: good camera, but...
Reviews.Author: DPD41
Reviews.Content: The camera is easy to use and has a lot of features that I like. I'm impressed with the image stabilization that allows picture taking at 18X without a tripod. I'm disappointed, though, in a few things. First, as advanced as this camera is, it can't sense when pictures are taken in portrait mode and automatically rotate them when they are saved on the computer. A Kodak digital camera I bought about seven years ago had that feature, so it's not something new. Second, there's quite a lot of distortion in pictures taken at a moderately short distance, about six feet. I'd have thought that a Nikon would have a better quality lens. Finally, the camera is advertized as being red, but it's really more pink.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: usda faye "FJS"
Reviews.Content: My husband wanted a pocketable camera for an overseas trip and selected the S9300 Nikon. On a trial run, it performed beautifully, taking indoor, outdoor, dim lighting,bright sun on white sand and even a movie clip.  The clarity and color were astounding.  This is a good value.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Gabriela
Reviews.Content: This is my second Nikon, I prefer this than others, never a problem!It's easy to use and the pictures are really nice!!

Reviews.Title: Camera is not working already!  I just purchased it on 8/5/12!
Reviews.Author: allieboo1875
Reviews.Content: This camera worked great up until yesterday.  For no apparent reason, it has stopped working.  I can't get it to charge back up, and it won't turn on.  I am very careful with my electronic items, and this should not have happened after only 2 months of use.  It has never been dropped, and I charge it regularly.  I just uploaded pictures from it this past week.  I don't even understand why the camera would suddenly stop working.  I looked into returning it, and apparently my return window closed on 9/13/12.  Nice.  So now I am only eligible for a partial refund, they won't pay for shipping, and I am out the original shipping costs.  This is an expensive camera to begin with.  I am very unhappy!  And I really liked this camera to begin with.  I will never buy a camera from amazon again.

Reviews.Title: Hate this camera. Can we give zero stars??
Reviews.Author: Linda R. Ough
Reviews.Content: Never written a review before about anything until this camera. I hate it so much that I hope my review will prevent others from wasting their money.Have had many different point and shoots that have all had something that was annoying but I learned to cope with. They have all lasted me several years.I bought the coolpix s9300 in September of 2012.  It is so slow I was barely able to record my recent trip Egypt, a place I have wanted to go all my life.This is the main reason I purchased the camera.  I missed so many shots because the coolpix s9300 took forever to turn on, it took forever to take the shot after I pushed the button, it took forever to record the shot even after I turned off the preview feature. I got more photos of the ground because I would give up and decide the stupid camera must be broken or out of battery, which by the way it was at times. ( I faithfully recharged the battery every evening).  The panoramic feature would not record at all if the lighting changed during its use. My finger was always in the way of the flash, which is actually a feature I could learn to live with if the rest of the camera would actually shoot after point. Every single feature on the camera was a challange in some way. I met 2 other people on my trip tours that had purchased the same camera and they couldn't wait to return the cameras as soon as they got back from the trip. They and myself thought it was all user error until  we started comparing cameras and came to the conclusion that it was definitely the camera.  Every single time I asked someone to take my photo with my s9300 they commented that something must be wrong with my camera. My professional photographer friend wanted to take my photo with my camera thinking that I had no idea how to use the camera. After she finally gave up her comment was, "Let me be the first in line at the lake to throw this camera in." I am now researching point and shoots again...

Reviews.Title: Proprietary USB cable - nuff said
Reviews.Author: J. D. Baldwin "jd"
Reviews.Content: Why oh why would a product designer create a whole new kind of USB cable interface when there are several very serviceable standards out there that work perfectly well with a wide variety of hardware?Well, that's what Nikon has done with this thing, so good luck keeping track of this ONE cable among the dozens you probably have in your house.  And I haven't tried to replace one, but I'm sure the cost of doing so represents a 100x markup.  Badly done, Nikon.And while the 18x zoom is impressive on paper, good luck getting a really decent photo at that level.  Zoom numbers are the new megapixel numbers, I guess -- sacrifice whatever you have to sacrifice in order to get that number up, people won't look past it.  Probably works for marketing; not so great for photography.I'd be tickled pink to get this camera for $150.  For what it actually costs?  Forget it.

Reviews.Title: Great deal for the money
Reviews.Author: Laurie
Reviews.Content: I don't usually leave reviews but thought if it's helpful to someone, I'm going to do it.  I previously owned a less-expensive Coolpix and wanted one with a little more zoom.  While searching, I saw the wonderful deal on the S9200 and thought I'd give it a try.  After ordering I looked more into the reviews and I was a little worried about some of the comments people had made. I love this little gem and for this price, you just can't go wrong.  It's true that it does take a little getting used to.  The thing that maybe bothers me the most is where the flash is located but I will get used to it.  Like another review said, if you just take the time to read through the manual and figure things out, you will do just fine.  You can't expect to just open the box and start snapping pictures.  I think I got a great deal and I'm anxious to use it more.

Reviews.Title: pretty damn good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Cody
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because there was one little feature i didn't quite like. Even though the camera is densely feature rich what with the in-camera effects for post shooting and during shooting options, the reason i bought this camera was to record my school's talent show, and Graduation ceremony, not just for those two of course but for everyday shooting as well. But considering those two main reasons I was disappointed that, though I have a 32gb mem card, it only records videos 29 minutes at a time, even with the added recording pause feature (which i really like) it still wouldn't be enough time for the show even, let alone the Graduation Ceremony. I know the battery can handle it, that's why I'm disappointed. but over all a very good camera, I'm especially fond of the selective color effect and hi-contrast monochrome effect.

Reviews.Title: No paperwork provided in ENGLISH
Reviews.Author: Sandra S. Jarrell
Reviews.Content: What I disliked about the camera was that ALL paperwork other than what was on a computer disk was not in English.  I had to call Nikon to request the paperwork and was told I had to submit purchase documents online and that it would take time to get all the paperwork that should have come with the camera in ENGLISH in the first instance.

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy Nikon Cameras
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Joy Labott
Reviews.Content: This camera did not work right out of the box.  This camera was purchased as a gift, and the first time it was used it froze up.  The auto focus would freeze and the camera would make a loud buzzing sound.  The only way to resolve the problem was to remove the battery.  This would turn the camera off with the lens extended.  Upon reinstalling the battery the lens would retract.  When the camera was turned back on, the camera would freeze up and buzz again.  I contacted Nikon directly and was told that the Firmware needed to be updated.  I could also send the camera in for repair.  They also refused to send a replacement.  There response was that if I wanted to return the product I would need to deal with the seller.  I am sorry, but a brand new camera should not require repair before it can be used.  I feel that a company that will not try to resolve a faulty product that is brand new is a company I do not wish to do business with.  I would recommend avoiding Nikon at all costs.  This is one of those times that the phrase "buyer beware" is absolutely true.

Reviews.Title: Flash mal diseñado
Reviews.Author: Juan Carlos Vega
Reviews.Content: El flash, está ubicado en el sitio donde habitualmente se toma la cámara, por lo que es fácil olvidarlo y cuando se toma la foto el flash queda bloquedo por el dedo índice, esto originó muchas fotos fallidas, aparte de que eso posiblemente originó el fallo de la cámara

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Gene Brewster
Reviews.Content: Good pictures and easy to use. Like the zoom and all the different settings. Seems to have good battery life

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: spike
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to replace an old Kodak EasyShare for an upcoming vacation. Haven't utilized all the features yet but so far I'm pleased with the practice shots. Nice compact size & packs away easily. Good for point & shoot. Pop up flash is somewhat cumbersome but overall I'm pleased.

Reviews.Title: More than I expected!
Reviews.Author: Franco
Reviews.Content: The product is excellent, great zoom and great quality pictures. The GPS function works fine as well as the compass.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix s9200
Reviews.Author: photobug
Reviews.Content: Ordered this camera through amazon warehouse and received it when expected. Took it to Washington D.C. and got some really good photos. The zoom is sharp but recommend a tripod when using extreme zoom.Overall this is a great pocket camera and would recommend it to anyone who does not like carrying a large camera when you know you will be walking alot.

Reviews.Title: Love my Nikon!
Reviews.Author: Paul A. TeNyenhuis
Reviews.Content: I've had many cameras over the years and always wanted a Nikon, now I know why!  What a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Viewfinder  is like an i-phone
Reviews.Author: Barbara R. Stevko
Reviews.Content: The pictures are good in general and the weight, or lack thereof, make it a positive.  If you are used to framing a photo and properly focusing, it is impossible to use with accuracy and satisfaction.  Need a camera with a viewfinder for framing photos.

Reviews.Title: Takes great pictures
Reviews.Author: joseph hain
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, takes great pictures. Nikon is a name that you can trust. If you are like me, in that pictures mean a lot, don't purchase a cheap camera. I received the best price through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S9300 Red
Reviews.Author: Denise Montgomery
Reviews.Content: This is the coolest looking camera and I love that it is red.  The pictures are high quality and the booklet that comes with it helped me understand all the features.  I want to thank Nikon for including a booklet and not making me look stuff up on-line.  This is a plus for me.

Reviews.Title: A Joan Harris of cameras
Reviews.Author: GT Jeff Cherer "Kates Lil Buddy"
Reviews.Content: A little heavier than need be, it is yet efficient and does a great job. It is packed with goodies - 18x zoom, good battery, lotsa storage, 16megpix, HD video, a gps location finder, and easy to use controls. Like most of its size, it does not have a viewfinder so you have to mess with the fixed, uncovered display that cannot compete with bright sunlight or objects to scratch it. As cellphones get better cameras, cameras have to get better to justify carrying the extra object. This is worth the effort fersur.

Reviews.Title: love
Reviews.Author: Mellia
Reviews.Content: my husband got me this for my birthday. I love the color select and the awesome zoom! It also takes panoramic photos!

Reviews.Title: Had it less than a year and it malfuntioned!!
Reviews.Author: Joel
Reviews.Content: Thank God I had the Square Trade warranty on this product. It broke in less than a year with very little use. Had to send it in for a repair. This camera never really took a good pic. in my opinion. The pop up flash is cheap unnecessary add on. Shooting pics. in the macro mode sucks period. Will not focus well for basic close up shots for ebay pics.Just buy a regular camera for pics, and forget about the HD videos and any fancy stuff. Use a video camera for this. Just my opinion.I cannot recommend this camera to anyone based on my experience with it. Just too many problems.UPDATE:  I just lowered this to a 1 star because the pictures are blurry when shooting just regular pictures in auto mode.  Of all the days this camera decides to take a dump on Easter Sunday.  PLEASE do not buy this camera.  I have never seen a camera with so many flaws and I have owned several.  This really is a piece of crap, shame on Nikon for putting something like this on the market.

Reviews.Title: Lovely Camera.. Compact and Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: Perfect camera for youngsters or adults who require DSLR quality, but dont want to carry all those heavy equipment and lenses around.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: had to have a gps camera for work, it takes good pictures and records the data that we need for the job

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!!
Reviews.Author: Judy smith
Reviews.Content: Super amazing quality for a digital cam.  I love it and use it to take fun pictures all the time. I definitely recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Still cannot figure it out
Reviews.Author: Jetman
Reviews.Content: It is complicated to learn by yourself if you have never had a digital camera before. it is way too small and I should have gotten one that is easier to hold and handle. Pic quality, I do not know yet, I hope to learn soon. it is so small that I .do not think it will be useful for me, maybe a woman with smaller hands.

Reviews.Title: Great specs, mediocre performance
Reviews.Author: beeraylyn
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for a trip to China.  There were parts I liked a lot and parts I couldn't stand.The specs are great, the zoom and MP were just what I wanted and I got some fantastic pictures that I wouldn't have been able to capture on my phone.However a major drawback for me is the photo display.  It displays for 4 or 5 seconds after the photo is taken and you can't override the preview by attempting to take another photo.  You are simply paralyzed until the time is up.  Which may be fine in some cases, but when you're trying to catch a lion dance at a spring festival or swimming koi is obnoxious.  There's no adjusting it, it's either on for that period of time or its off completely - offering you no chance to decide if another picture is necessary.  I also had trouble getting this camera to focus promptly.  It would often take a couple attempts to get it right.Overall, just okay.  To get the specs I wanted, I had to spend more than I would have liked and I can't say the results would compel me to do it again.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Vivian Callahan
Reviews.Content: My friend came to see he had a camera like this I like it and ordered one for myself I love it

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: Enrique Elgor
Reviews.Content: I am surprise it is a grait product I am so glad for excellent product an quality so I recommended so mooch.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Pocket Camera
Reviews.Author: Robert Warren
Reviews.Content: I got this when my old digital camera broke. It has high resolution, a great optical zoom, and once I got familiar with the focus settings, I have really enjoyed having it with me almost all the time. I get great pictures of landscapes and wildlife, have got some great low light shots and enjoy the small size compared to DSLR cameras with coarser density. It does not have a manual shutter setting, which would be nice, and Nikon has already replaced it with a different model that has more features. I consider it a good purchase, and am pleased with almost all the shots I take with it.

Reviews.Title: Excited
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: I had the previous version of this camera but the camera broke down after a major fall. I loved everything about it - the zoom, the display screen, the clear pictures, easy focus. I just received my new camera yesterday. The package was delivered extremely fast and came with everything the description had mentioned!!

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Nancy Zastudil
Reviews.Content: It has great features and picture quality.  This camera is very easy to use.  It is a great value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera With Far Zoom
Reviews.Author: Picky traveler
Reviews.Content: This camera produce spectacular photos. To add to that, you can zoom in extremely far with the 18x optical zoom. This camera is highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: Crystal-Rain Love
Reviews.Content: Battery runs down FAST and a lot of pictures come out fuzzy. I've used it at a few concerts. The zoom is great, but hard to get good pictures sometimes in that type of lighting, with movement.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for the money.
Reviews.Author: Bob Sarver
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Nikon COOLPIX S9200 mostly based on the review I read on the Amazon website.  It has been an excellent camera in nearly all respects.  The only complaint I can think of at the moment is the placement of the flash.  I have a tendency to hold the camera with my left hand when taking a photo and my forefinger is sometimes in the way of the flash when it pops up.  All in all, a great camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Emilu
Reviews.Content: I love my camera. I have taken it around the world, I absolutely love it. Great resolution.The only not so good thing is, that it takes a little while to turn on. If you want to take a picture of something immediately, you may not make it.

Reviews.Title: W O W
Reviews.Author: mitchradio
Reviews.Content: Great Photos always, this is the best one I have used since Digital started. This camera gives great photos in all environments, Just have a tripod available to get great Night shots, the clarity is astounding and near perfect color rendition.  Easy yo operate and shoots in a hurry so you do not miss the moment. Video is good with the HDMI output directly from camera to watch on any size screen.I use a DSLR but this camera is pocket size so it goes every where!

Reviews.Title: GREAT little camera!
Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: I love the size of this little guy, pretty perfect for almost any purse or just carrying around at events. It has a lot of features, and unlike other reviews, I've never noticed the battery going very quickly. I purchased the SanDisk Ultra 8 GB Class 10 memory card at the advice of other reviewers and my battery lasts through multiple photo taking events. I usually plug it into the computer to charge it while I'm downloading pics, and it does great. Only thing I would change is the panoramic setting, but that's more of a universal camera thing right now. I really dislike the sweeping panoramic setting, and the fact that it's either only 180 or 360 degrees, what about just a 2 shot width photo? The 180 looks like you would have meshed at least 3 or 4 pictures together, and sometimes I just want about 1/2 of that in the shot. Also, on "portrait" it sometimes takes its time to focus, there's kinda a trick to it, but all in all, for the price, it's a pretty good little camera.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed overall
Reviews.Author: Israel Heck
Reviews.Content: Pros:Small and compactTakes pretty good videoCons:Pictures are blurry and grainyNot really happy with it. I replaced it with the Canon EOS-M and its so much better.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Zuzanna Czerny
Reviews.Content: I got this camera recently and it works perfectly fine! I think it is a wonderful gift idea for the whole family!

Reviews.Title: Great for outdoor pictures
Reviews.Author: Happyhmschool
Reviews.Content: We bought these cameras for our daughters who have a small photography business.  They're great for outdoor pictures and have some fun features like color filtering.  I don't like that you have to plug them into the wall to charge them. It would be nice to be able to have extra batteries like we do for our other Nikon.  We can just pop in a fresh battery while the other is charging.  It limits us when we go on vacations where electricity is at a minimum.  I would also prefer to have the option of the smaller view finder in addition to the large screen.

Reviews.Title: An alright camera
Reviews.Author: Lindsay
Reviews.Content: I'm not a professional by any means but I like this camera for the most part. My only real (and biggest) issue is that I got this camera specifically because I wanted to be able to take pictures of moving people and subjects without much blur, I got the opposite with this. Even taking a picture of an inanimate object comes out blurry no matter what setting I try. Maybe it's something I'm doing wrong but I've tried everything. Otherwise not a bad camera but like I said, I'm not a professional so I don't use it professionally and can't vouch for specs or anything really.

Reviews.Title: Cough up the extra $ and buy a Canon
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: Within first couple of months, camera shuts off with lens still open.  Have had a number of "non view-able" files on my camera card even though I've only used this camera card with this camera.  Resolution of viewfinder is poor.  Camera is pretty big, bulky, and heavy.  Overall, very dissatisfied with this product.  I bought it for my gf and have only used it for an hour or so and this is my quick review :(  Wish I had a chance to play with it within the first month of buying it.

Reviews.Title: Disapointed
Reviews.Author: William Luepke
Reviews.Content: Takes a great picture which is expected from Nikon but is not all that easy to use. Flash location sucks. The preset picture mode dial on the back does not have a fast action/motion feature on it. I was at a parade where costumed people where on stilts and moving very quickly by me because of there long strides. Without that feature none of those pictures turned out descent. I should have stayed with the Canon Easy Share like I had before.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: April
Reviews.Content: My husband has this camera and loves it. When my son wanted a camera for his birthday, my husband did not hesitate to buy him the same one.

Reviews.Title: GOOD BUT SOME ISSUES
Reviews.Author: Nancy Drohan
Reviews.Content: Still learning all the settings.  Also, with it had something to hang on to as it can slip out of your hand easily.  Takes good pictures and is easy to transfer to the computer.

Reviews.Title: Amazon is the best place to do your shopping. Bar none!!! I keep coming back for personal use and for gift shopping as well.
Reviews.Author: Marc
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Takes awesome pics and videos.  Bar none!!! I keep coming back for personal use and for gift shopping as well.

Reviews.Title: about the camera, its a very good equipment, compact, solid, and excelent resolutions.
Reviews.Author: Humberto Bloise
Reviews.Content: I was spectting better pictures for micro photos.about the camera, its a very good equipment, compact, solid, and excelent resolutions.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Bill M
Reviews.Content: I've been using this camera for 6 months now and have nothing negative to say about it. Great optical zoom and battery life. Takes great pictures. I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied owner
Reviews.Author: Lindsay A. Michael
Reviews.Content: Works well. Low lighting and action photos don't turn out well without adjusting options. But you can't have it do everything for you right? Very pleased with purchase.

Reviews.Title: The ONLY think I don't like is the popup flash.
Reviews.Author: Paul C
Reviews.Content: Great camera, great zoom, great mega pixels, great pictures.  The ONLY think I don't like is the popup flash.  I hadn't noticed it when I was buying the camera on Amazon.  I feel like it's going to break, and sometimes it pops and startles you...  Sometimes if I'm holding the camera on that side, my hand interferes with it popping up.  I just wish the flash was built in like the other bunch of digital cameras I've owned.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: B. Poston
Reviews.Content: I am using this camera in my dental office to take intraoral pictures and it is working great. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Not one of Nikon's best.
Reviews.Author: Chad McMillan
Reviews.Content: Although I am a lifelong Nikon owner...over 40 years...having owned big cameras, to small ones...I have been nothing but disappointed in this one.  Mainly, it does not focus well.  Photos are not very clear.  I would advice against purchasing this to anyone interested.

Reviews.Title: Doing what it was designed to do, and more for all my needs
Reviews.Author: Richard W.
Reviews.Content: The camera does all I want it to do. Small enough to carry around. Automatic enough to support my needs, without being a camera buff

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Max Bennett
Reviews.Content: Great value, excellent camera, size is right. We needed to replace our Canon pocket camera with a slightly better one, I have a Nikon SLR and know they make good quality camera's so this is the one we chose. Very happy with our choice.

Reviews.Title: Delighted
Reviews.Author: Lynn Grace
Reviews.Content: An awesome camera bought as a gift and one that keeps on giving by capturing memories.  The quality and the resolution of the pictures is perfect and the video function is an added bonus.

Reviews.Title: Could not ask for better!
Reviews.Author: Logan
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera with a good optical zoom and high quality pictures but that would still fit in my front pants pocket easily. This did all of it! Even survived a rather terrifying tumble in France with only a slight scratch!

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Monica
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, as always Nikon cameras are great, this is compact, easy to use, not cheap but not expensive, just what we needed.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work out of the box
Reviews.Author: Cheryl
Reviews.Content: I got it and it wouldn't take pictures or focus or anything. I'm returning it, and I think I'll buy a different camera.

Reviews.Title: Very unimpressed both with construction quality and picture quality
Reviews.Author: Stan Siewert
Reviews.Content: Battery/card door doesn't have an effective detent so the door opens on occasion.  Autofocus works most the time, though sometimes it just can't seem to get it right.One of the reasons I went with this model was I expected the GPS data to be included in the exif photo file.  Even with the  GPS logging running, the location coordinates don't later show up in the photo info (iphoto 09),  Camera reports no A-GPS file on the card, so I'm guessing the satellite almanac isn't available and even after leaving it outside with a clear view of the sky, it still doesn't have the almanac.  Maybe if you are willing to use the included software, you'd have better luck.

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: izzy706
Reviews.Content: Pros are everything. This is a great quality camera, and the price cannot be beat. Does everything more expensive cameras do, and has an excellent zoom. Its a Nikon, so you are getting quality.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S9200 16 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 18x Zoom NIKKOR ED Glass...
Reviews.Author: Washington B.
Reviews.Content: we bought this camera because of the brand ,  it's turned to be a very good quality at a low price .

Reviews.Title: Mostly good
Reviews.Author: Patti Vanlerberghe
Reviews.Content: I love almost everything about this camera like the size, pictures, features, great zoom BUT what I hate is how long it takes to " recharge", or get ready to take the next picture. Unless you have it on a series setting, you can't just keep clicking. Sometimes very frustrating.

Reviews.Title: very complicated
Reviews.Author: ELEANOR H BARNETT
Reviews.Content: Could not take picture without having to hold the flash down, when flash does flash picture is foggy!  Would not recommend!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Betty Spies
Reviews.Content: Great little camera.  Hint... Use timer on camera for telephoto shots  to get clearer shots. Caused by lag time.  Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Another great Nikon
Reviews.Author: Jacob
Reviews.Content: I have been using Nikon's for years, and used their SLR cameras for years. I know have a D5100 DSLR, and wanted something to carry around when I didn't want to carry the DSLR. This is great. The quality is amazing for a point and shoot, and the GPS is fun when using it with lightroom or iPhoto.

Reviews.Title: Nikon camera
Reviews.Author: Doris Crowder
Reviews.Content: The camera is easy to use, small enough to fit in a pocket, and takes excellent pictures. Easy to crop pictures after viewing them

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: joseph
Reviews.Content: . easy to use, great pictures, software is easy to use its small size makes it very portable, great zoom

Reviews.Title: Buy Nikon!
Reviews.Author: James Needham "Christxn"
Reviews.Content: I bought the S9200 to replace/upgrade from my 5600. I made the mistake of trying a $89 Kodak camera as a replacement for the 5600 and quickly realized that I missed the quality Nikkor lens. I went back to my Nikon 5600 until I could afford to upgrade to a newer model Nikon. The 5600 was my first Nikon purchase and happened by chance. I needed/wanted a good point and shoot digital and found the Nikon as a clearance/open box item. After trying other cameras and researching deeply, I am sold on Nikon for good. I am amazed at the incredible picture quality of these photos when viewed on a 42" HDTV, and the hi-def video is absolutely amazing. I especially like the rechargeable batteries, and the extra features with this little camera are limitless. I would not hesitate to buy any Nikon camera with the Nikkor lens. They make a great product worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Nikon
Reviews.Author: Christopher Cockell
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures but the flash was broken out of the box. The flash pops up right where you hold the camera. This makes you have to hold the camera in an odd way. Customer Service for Nikon was not any help either. I am glad I purchased the Square Trade Warranty.

Reviews.Title: Dead pixel and dust below screen
Reviews.Author: Georg Lim
Reviews.Content: Nikon COOLPIX S9300 was good on the external look but fail on the internal as there are dead pixel and dust hiding under the screen, is there a way to do a exchange or replacement

Reviews.Title: Stopped Working in 10 Months
Reviews.Author: B. W. Miller
Reviews.Content: Not a great camera in the 1st place, but ok then stopped charging correctly and not able to use.  It appeared to be a good deal for 130$ however I thought it might last longer.  I had a charging problem with a previous Nikon and new batteries didn't solve the problem.  I know Nikon's are suppose to be good, but my Kodak's have lasted longer.  I would advise against getting this camera, but not sure of what to suggest.

Reviews.Title: GPS doesn't work well
Reviews.Author: Connie
Reviews.Content: I specifically bought this because it had the GPS feature and it would not show the location when I downloaded it to my own photo program. I contacted Nikon and they said the pictures had to be downloaded to their own picture program (which is included). I loaded it on my computer and it still didn't show the location of the pictures and was very confusing to use.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: T. Shuck
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my boss to take photos when visiting clients.  It is a great camera and is easy to use.  At the time of my  purchase, it was listed for a great price and I could not pass up the deal.  So far, so good and she is really happy with it.

Reviews.Title: great price but I had to send it to nikon for repairs within 45 days.  They fixed it at no charge.  I had to pay for the shippin
Reviews.Author: Dane Dansie
Reviews.Content: I don't think a camera should go bad within 2 months.  The shutter would not close and it has a finicky dial that has to be just right to take a picture.

Reviews.Title: A cool camera
Reviews.Author: Roy P.
Reviews.Content: Camera is working well . I  will be taking it on a very long trip to India and Dubai. This will tell the true story . I will now the full extent on the completion of my trip.

Reviews.Title: S9300 Stay away
Reviews.Author: jayteee
Reviews.Content: I had this camera for less than 6 months.  The lens jammed, the battery wouldn't charge in the camera, and finally the LCD screen stopped working.It was my fault that I didn't listen to the reviews.  Nikon service was worse than the camera's performance.This is not your father's Nikon....

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Dennis W. Carignan "Car Man"
Reviews.Content: Great point and shoot camera and is small enough to fit anywhere.  The picture quality is not as good as my D60, but more than adequate for 90% of the shooting I do now.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Swati
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my relative. He really liked its quality and i got this in good deal so value for money

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX
Reviews.Author: GANANA
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MOST FEATURES ON THIS CAMERA BUT IT HAS A FEW PROBLEMS. THE LENS DOES NOT HAVE A COVER OR GLASS OVER THE IT.  THE FLASH IS IN AN AWKWARD PLACE ON THE LEFT AND ON THE TOP.  THE CAMERA IS SO SMALL, IT HAS NO OTHER PLACE TO PUT THE LEFT HAND AND THE FLASH POPS UP UNDERNEATH MY HAND..IT TAKES WONDERFUL PICTURES.

Reviews.Title: Really easy to use and great quality
Reviews.Author: Jim Seidel
Reviews.Content: I love being able to blow up and save a portion of a pic as a new pic.great size and quality

Reviews.Title: a good compromise
Reviews.Author: Carol "saxchick"
Reviews.Content: This is a fine camera for the money, but I don't have much luck with the image stabilization feature. I take a lot blurry photos to get one that is acceptable. I've also noticed that all of the new digital cameras I've purchased in the past 5 years take pictures that are inferior to those taken with the old Nikon Coolpix 3.2 megapixel. I suspect the old lenses were better quality - maybe glass instead of plastic. The size of the camera is a good compromise: just small enough to fit reasonably in a purse, but still a pretty good zoom.

Reviews.Title: A very nice little Camera
Reviews.Author: Elaine
Reviews.Content: It is a nice little camera but I do think the yellows are a little washed out at times since I am taking pictures as the fall grasses turn gold. Sometimes leaves show the golds but the grasses sometimes are washed out. Other wise I like it very much . Its size is wonderful. It works easily and for the most part takes nice pictures.But because of its size it is sometimes harder to hold still than a larger camera because there is less to  hold on to..However the ease with which  it goes into a large purse so can be there when ever needed very much offsets the  difficulty of holding it still enough. I have been taking pictures for many years and have one of the early digital nikon cameras however I should have waited and gotten  a Digital SLR and I could have used my lenses to some extent. It takes beautiful pictures but is very big and heavy and as I say is not a SLR. In the mean time I have enjoyed playing with some of the better Kodaks and their more brillent colors

Reviews.Title: Wonderful point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: RocknRollGal109
Reviews.Content: I love this product alot more than my previous Nikon. This thing takes some really, fantastic pictures and it's easy to use and super fun to just play with. My only "gripe" about his camera is the flash doesn't always pop up when you turn on the camera all in all it's a good camera.

Reviews.Title: Awasome
Reviews.Author: Kaan Burak CAKIROGLU
Reviews.Content: Perfect video quality , And also gps is a good point to consider.but i recommend to buy extra battery.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, little package
Reviews.Author: Tiffany Nicholson
Reviews.Content: nice point and shot.  my wife and I take it everywhere to take pictures of our daughter.  Couldn't ask for more, not for what we paid.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: jude
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!  Takes great pictures.  The price is better than anywhere I have seen it.  It is a great find!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Kathleen L. Teall
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use and takes great pictures.  It has a really effective zoom and several different options.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera under 150 bucks
Reviews.Author: Priyan
Reviews.Content: Nice camera to buy for 150 or less.The battery back up is very less and you have to buy back up batteries.The pictures are really good.. added star to the 18X xoom

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera!
Reviews.Author: Stefano E.
Reviews.Content: This camera is astonishing. It has a solid body that confers a professional aspect as well a firm grip. Zoom is incredible for this class of cameras, and video/audio capabilities are more than enough for the amateur. Extremely recommended.

Reviews.Title: i'm no expert photog
Reviews.Author: jennifer powell
Reviews.Content: but, my husband is and this camera fascinates him, even though he has a canon T2i.  the panorama is a fun feature, the multiple focus areas and best shot capabilities are useful and easy to enable or disable depending on your subject while remaining in manual mode or straight shooting as opposed to scene modes.  there's plenty to play around with with this camera, but i love the telephoto capabilities alone.  great, monitor matching prints that you can count on!my previous camera was a nikon as well so i'm used to the format, i can see that it's something that my mother wouldn't be able to grasp, but it's not difficult for anyone who's been a digital camera owner before.  the price is reasonable.  but, i hit a sale!  i'd recommend waiting for one.i find no use for gps, so i never intended upon buying the S9300.  the manual for the two cameras is identical.  waste of money, imo for  gps.one feature i wish was still avalable in this model as opposed to my last nikon... stop motion.  that was a blast.  too bad.  however, panorama may be a fair trade, i'm just not sure why i couldn't have both.  that knocked a star off.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: John A. Misso
Reviews.Content: NIKON IS KNOWN AS ONE OF THE BEST MAKER OF CAMERAS...THIS MODEL HAS REALY IMPRESSED ME BECAUSE OF THE ZOOM FEATURE AND THE CLARITY OF THE PICTURES...18 X ZOOMS FOR SUCH A COMPACT CAMERA IS AMAZING...IT ALSO HAS A GPS TO LET YOU KNOW WHERE THE PICTURE WAS TAKEN...I LOVE IS SO MUCH THAT A MONTH LATER I ORDERED ANOTHER ONE FOR MY WIFE...THANK YOU NIKON

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: For the price, I think this is a great camera. The features delivers and are fun to play with. I didn't realize that aperture cannot be fiddled with until I read the manual. I bought this camera as a beginner's camera, but I found my options for manual settings to be very limited. Not really complaining though. I think I got a great deal. I get to practice the fundamentals and basics (and figure out how much I actually enjoy photography) before I invest in something better.

Reviews.Title: Nice and sleek camera
Reviews.Author: Sumeet
Reviews.Content: Good point and shoot camera - nice and sleek.  Fits into the pocket easily - but don't try keeping it in your back pocket.  Either you or the camera will get injured. ;-)I would have loved to have a view finder in this camera, but nevertheless, this camera is good.

Reviews.Title: Nikon is the best
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It has different functions, a good zoom 18x, multiple effects, fast shoots.Good price, good product, an excellent digital camera.

Reviews.Title: coolpix
Reviews.Author: Scrapbook Mom
Reviews.Content: Not sure if I am doing anything wrong, but this camera does not focus that well. I feel that there is some kind of setting that I am missing to set it up so it takes a clear picture. I have a Canon that takes the perfect picture every time. I thought I would try the Nikon due to the great reviews. I wish I could send it back.

Reviews.Title: Video quality vs name brand
Reviews.Author: TankCCR
Reviews.Content: Video quality was good but it kept going out of focus and got extremely hot when taking videos or just being on. The picture quality is okay, it takes a couple shots to get it crystal clear and for a $150+ camera it doesn't do anything right. Leaving 2 stars on this because there was some good videos and pictures captured while this camera was in my hands but i kept going back to my iphone for vids and pics so it boils down to - if i can't have a camera that can do one job correctly, whats the point of it? Phones can do their job better, so Nikon better start paying Ashton Kutcher a little bit less and make better cameras.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera!
Reviews.Author: Nancy E. Radcliffe
Reviews.Content: Camera and case fit well in my purse and it travels with me everywhere! It often takes a better picture than my D90!

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: MisDoc
Reviews.Content: The pictures are fabulous!  The camera is easy to use, and the color is good.  It was refurbished, but works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Dotfromoz
Reviews.Content: This is a great point and shoot camera. The only issue is that at high zoom it is difficult to hold steady. Enlarged prints come out beautiful. Most of my pictures are animals or landscapes. I highly recommend this camera. The price is very reasonable for the quality.

Reviews.Title: I made a COOLPIX!!!
Reviews.Author: Char
Reviews.Content: I made a very good Coolpix. I love this camera! It is easy to operate. The pictures are all excellent. The results are amazing! It has so many good features...I am excited about the pictures I am about to take during my vacation in Nassau. This camera is amazing. This is a pix I am glad I chose...

Reviews.Title: The best digital camera I've ever had. I'll give it 5 stars, but list 4 minor flaws.
Reviews.Author: Zhanna Tay
Reviews.Content: The only very small flaws:1) when the flash is turned off, motion blur is pretty obvious with movement. (when flash is on, there's no motion blur even if you swing it around quite a bit)2) The max stats for photos, it says 9999 which is fine. But the max space for video says 29 minutes, which kind of confused me at first, since I have a 64 GB super fast SD card. But it DOES record well over 29 minutes.3) The charger isn't a charger. It's a USB to Wall Plug adapter so I cannot take out the battery to charge it, I can only charge while it's in the camera.4) When you zoom to the max, automatic zoom doesn't seem to be working too well - but once you set the zoom back a little it's more able to focus.All that aside, this is the best camera I've owned so far, in both ease of use, and versatility, and the quality of both photo and video is fantastic! For all the great positives, look at the camera's description - it is exactly as good as it's described!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, slow response
Reviews.Author: MD
Reviews.Content: The quality if the pics are good although some times the autofocus did not work.  The battery life is okay. At times it showed 50% charged ad then it would suddenly shut down because of exhaustion. The response time between snapshot is very slow.  It takes a while for the viewfinder to refesh for the next shot.

Reviews.Title: Proprietary USB Cable- Really? -Returned
Reviews.Author: Will Hocksteader
Reviews.Content: Bottom line, proprietary USB cable.  I travel with cables already! I'm not bringing another proprietary cable! Product returned for this reason.

Reviews.Title: Really a nice cam for the buck!
Reviews.Author: Fenton B Slaughter
Reviews.Content: I lucked out, and caught this on sale. It's a great piece of equipment. I've only used it a few times so far, but I am very happy with the results of the photos I've taken.And, with the purchase of the accessory kit, (I mentioned in another rating), it was definitely an awesome purchase and product.

Reviews.Title: great pocket camera
Reviews.Author: famof5
Reviews.Content: Really enjoying camera now after having for three months. Yes the flash pop up can be annoying but you get use to it. T he best part is all fun tricks it has in editing. My 10 yr old thinks it is the coolest to use. Pictures come out great!

Reviews.Title: All it does is take pictures
Reviews.Author: Marianne Greenfield "grave art"
Reviews.Content: I've had a smart phone for years but want a camera to take on vacation.
