I wanted a camera that uses AA batteries but when I chose the GPS option for this camera (I think) it came with a rechargeable lithium battery.  Grrrrr.  I can't figure out how to use it but I'm 65 years old so that may have something to do with it.  I have to find a kid to show me.  The photos are good quality for the limited times I've used it so far.  I just wish I could send from it.

Reviews.Title: Takes good pictures. Short battery life.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I sometimes choose to bring this camera with me over my dslr because it fits in my pocket. Picture quality is real good. I often use the high contrast b&w; mode, and the color selection mode. Battery has died on me several times in a matter of hours.  I finally had to buy a backup. No other complaints but that's a major one.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Crzza
Reviews.Content: I have had it for 7 months and it works flawlessly. It takes crystal clear pictures up close and far away. The 18X zoom is a wonderful feature. It is easy to use as a camera and also takes good videos. I have used it to video my boyfriend playing tennis so he can improve his game. The only thing I would change is the pop up flash, but you get used to it after awhile.

Reviews.Title: did not come with charger
Reviews.Author: Brenda Bull
Reviews.Content: I was excited about this camera. Took it on a family vacation to Disney and only got 1 1/2 days of photo's. No charger came with it. It did say there was one on the box.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Kevin Tacheny
Reviews.Content: Not bad overall for the price, but it definitely has it's moments of problems like taking fuzzy pictures for no reason at all. I need to check out the manual better and see if I can correct that myself. But overall it's okay for a point and shoot camera. Don't expect great things from it.

Reviews.Title: Wow, how can anyone find this worth more than on star
Reviews.Author: C. C. Nienhaus
Reviews.Content: The positive:When you do get a good shot the optics seem pretty good.Panoramic mode under SCENE setting is really a nice, accept the pic resolution is reduced when using it.GPS tags on photosThe negative:Auto Focus:Auto Focus is slow and glitches a lot.  Seems to bounce in and out of focus on start up especially, but even after being on for awhile it doesn't always focus.  I have lost soooo many good shots from this.  It's really annoying to the point of angering me at times.  We are talking family moments you will never catch again, that were lost because of the bad quality of this product.  I have literally gone back to using my Canon powershot 900 from 2006 because it is much more reliable.  I always bought Canon in the past, but decided to try Nikon for my latest camera.  BIG Mistake.  Canon AF is far superior to Nikon in my opinion.When using Video mode zoomed in to any distance at all the auto focus bounces and cannot acquire a good focus.When using camera in low light condition where the red light focus assist beam is used the camera literally can't focus.  It try's over and over until the shot is gone.  By contrast the 2006 Canon 900 focuses in less than a second.  Almost instantaneous, which shows me its not a technical challenge today for camera to achieve this if canon was doing it 7 years ago.  What is your excuse Nikon?  This is pathetic.Camera Body Design:Mode Select knob is a joke, one has to continually check it due to the fact that a stiff breeze may flip the setting.  I am now in the habit of checking the nob setting obsessive compulsively while taking pictures.Video record location on the back of the camera is annoying.  Its kind of awkward when one handing the camera to get your thumb up there to start video.  I think it should be next to picture button up top or some where more accessible to finger tip, not thumb.Panoramic  mode, although can produce some cool results, is very temperamental, and keeps canceling the shot if you do not move very precisely.For the price this camera is really not worth it, even if it was cheaper you may lose many important shots.  I suggest going with a Canon.  The AF technology is far better than Coolpix garbage.

Reviews.Title: Terrible product.
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: I have only had the camera for about 2 months. It hasn't been taking good pictures at all. Now it is having a problem with the lens. Don't waste your money on this over priced piece of crap.

Reviews.Title: Compact, simple to use!
Reviews.Author: holtster "sh"
Reviews.Content: Fits right in my purse!  Great low light photos!  No trouble with zoom clarity.  The flash is in an awkward position where I would normally place my pointer finger when shooting a photo, but I can live with it!  The camera is simpe to use. Would definitely recommend this camera for friends wanting a small, nice camera.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Cookpix is Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Kasi Gardner
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THis CoolPIx!! IT has been perfect for our little family. Also small enough to carry around from place to place on vacation.

Reviews.Title: Average Nikon camera
Reviews.Author: traveldiva
Reviews.Content: Not very good in low light situations. Prefer Canon cameras for this purpose.  I will keep this camera around as a back up camera only.

Reviews.Title: worked
Reviews.Author: Miroslaba
Reviews.Content: nice camera, the package got here quickly, and the lens was fine, no big signs of trauma and have had it for about 4 months

Reviews.Title: it's OK but not great
Reviews.Author: Zhao Liu
Reviews.Content: some pictures are blurry.  Make sure you take pix at the Correct setting, otherwise pix will turn out blurry.  In general it's not too bad, but not excellent

Reviews.Title: I really like it
Reviews.Author: Drake Rosser
Reviews.Content: It takes really nice pictures, it's easy to carry, it's good.  Great price with lots of different setting options. Good clarity.

Reviews.Title: takes beautifull pics
Reviews.Author: mimi
Reviews.Content: i bougt this camera to use during my summer vacation i wanted a camera that wasnt al to big but could take great quality pictures! this camera exeeds my expectations!!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S9300
Reviews.Author: Anne Machetto
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter.  She has two small children and all she had was a big DSLR to take pictures with.  She wanted something that she could throw in her purse but would also take great pictures.  She is thrilled with it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: singerbev
Reviews.Content: This camera has all the features that I was looking for plus more.  Very east to handle.  Instructions are also easy to follow.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX camera
Reviews.Author: Maya Designnona Wesley
Reviews.Content: Great camera!  I need to read the booklet again as I know I could be using the camera more to my advantage. The instructions are lengthy and require concentration especially for a novice. Even without reading the entire booklet (hardly any) I am still getting amazing photos!

Reviews.Title: It is working fine.
Reviews.Author: yogesh goel
Reviews.Content: It is working fine, but when we take night snaps the results are not good.  During the day time it is working fine.

Reviews.Title: Nice quick pictures
Reviews.Author: Laura Lapey Woodard
Reviews.Content: So far, we really like this camera.  It takes quick shots and is easily ready for the next one.  The flash pops up automatically.  Easy to download and holds the charge for a long time!  It's a little bigger than some of the digital cameras out there, but we like the heavier feel.

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal!
Reviews.Author: joshtsunami
Reviews.Content: The pictures are super clear.  The 18x zoom is truly awesome!  The controls I need are easily found on the back side without having to search all through the various menusthe pictures are super clear,

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this camera to anyone who takes alot of pictures and travels. The only thing is carry a spare battery with you (can be purchased most any store).

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S9200
Reviews.Author: Pat S.
Reviews.Content: I did not like this camera at all.  It was cumbersome and the flash popped up right where I put my finger to steady the camera.  Very slow shutter speed.  Returned the camera.

Reviews.Title: Difficult to use
Reviews.Author: patricia Hudgens
Reviews.Content: pictures are blurry very often....don't know why....seems the camera is hard to focus ...........not real happy with this purchase....when it does take a non blury picture...it is awesome...guess I just got to figure out how to hold it perfectly still....any suggestions?

Reviews.Title: Camera heats up after 10 min
Reviews.Author: Si-Yin Chung
Reviews.Content: This camera was defective because after 10 min of pictures- or video-taking, the camera began to heat up, and it got worse (more heat was generated) after 15 min.For this reason, I sent the camera back to the Return Department in Lexington, KY via UPS this morning, June 25, 2013 for a full refund.Si-Yin ChungBuyer

Reviews.Title: It's a good little point-and-shoot with a very good 18x optical lens.
Reviews.Author: Thomas E. Krueger
Reviews.Content: I have used it quite a lot since I got it, and overall, I like it.  There are a couple of things that are, to me, less than ideal.  First, the flash has to pop up from the camera body to be used.  I've taken a lot of underexposed pictures simply because the fingers holding the left side of the camera were keeping the flash from popping up.  Second, there is a fairly long lag between pressing the button and actually taking the picture.  That means action shots are almost impossible.  But I have taken a lot of really good pictures with it, and it's relatively easy to understand and use.  Good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Met most of my spectations
Reviews.Author: Bernal Herrera Monteagudo
Reviews.Content: The camera takes very good pictures and it is easy to operate The only flaw is dificult to hold, it will be better with a raice in the case in the right side of the camera.  Some raiced dots over the flash will make it better too.

Reviews.Title: Very good.
Reviews.Author: Dennis Cabral "Dennis Cabral"
Reviews.Content: Just as I expected from a super name like Nikon, it is not my first Nikon Camera and for sure will not be my last, getting great results as has become normal.

Reviews.Title: Not so bad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: For the price, it is a good camera. Love the quality of the pictures, video quality could be better. U

Reviews.Title: Beautiful pictures !!!
Reviews.Author: Sandra Pino
Reviews.Content: Pictures are beautiful and easy to take, good response.  Videos are in HD. The battery longs for a lot of photos.

Reviews.Title: Uneven performance
Reviews.Author: Richard Stern
Reviews.Content: On the plus side the S9300 takes good pictures.  On the negative side, the processor is flaky and gets "stuck" from time to time, leaving me unable to turn on the flash, or fixing the distance controls in a certain position, etc.  This happens intermittently and has been enormously frustrating.  Resetting the controls to the factory defaults does not always solve the problem.

Reviews.Title: My last Nikon
Reviews.Author: L. Johnson
Reviews.Content: I used his camera on a European trip in 2012 and was basically happy with my pics. This year, on a trip to Paris, I am extremely disappointed in the shots especially interior shots. I also had my old Nikon S3 which took much better shots. The 9300 will be my last Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Octavio Alvarado Morales
Reviews.Content: I worked in photography for five years and have been pleased with the quality of photographs featuring Nikon camera, I'd like a professional camera but for now I'll take this.

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Keith B. "Keith B."
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for vacation.  Wanted to have a small pocket camera instead of carrying my Cannon 40D.  This camera was great.  Really liked the long zoom.  Picture quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Scott Degraffenreid
Reviews.Content: I looked at a number of cameras both larger and smaller up to around $300 and this one looked like the best deal. Since receiving it about a month ago I've taken approx 200 pics and can't believe the quality. The macro shots are especially sharp, clear and well lit. I'm an experienced film photog and this little jewel puts my best shots with my old Hasselblad 2 1/4 format to shame. Can't imagine what I'd need a better or more capable camera for? Couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed announcement did not report that it was a used item.
Reviews.Author: Paulino Vidal
Reviews.Content: I have really bought that camera thinking it was a new product.I received the camera and, for my surprise, I realized that it was an used camera and moreover the general conditions were not really good. There are some scratches on the LCD screen and unfortunately, there is dust and sand over its body and lens.Disappointed announcement did not report that it was a used item.Amazon intervened and returned part of the value of this item.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Rosie Juarez
Reviews.Content: Just as expected, Awesome!!! Not complicated, works great! Will definite consider another when the time comes to buy another one!

Reviews.Title: I would NOT recommend.
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera hoping that it would work great. Truth is it's not as good as you may think. When a picture is taken it comes out blurry even when you think the camera is perfectly still and you tried to manual focus it yourself. I even tried taking a picture with a tripod thinking it would keep it steady and not produce a blurry picture but sadly it did come out blurry. The battery life does not last long and it takes 3 hours and 50 min to charge a fully exhausted battery.(stated in manual) When zoomed in it will not focus! It will not focus for a picture, it will not focus on a video very well. My android infuse takes better pictures than this, yes the Nikon's color is much better but it is blurry! So to wrap it up, the pictures are blurry and will not focus when zoomed in. I really hoped this helped and that you find yourself a great camera. I'll be returning mine soon.

Reviews.Title: Good buy for the dollar
Reviews.Author: bill pettys
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. Good speed, good optics, good flash. You have to be careful with it; keep it in a protected case.

Reviews.Title: Coolpics Camera
Reviews.Author: Jo
Reviews.Content: It was very hard to operate for me, and I thought the pics were not up to par. I think I needed a beefier camera to hold onto also.

Reviews.Title: Gift to daughter
Reviews.Author: coffeeman
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to my daughter to replace the "starter" camera she was using.  She knew exactly what she wanted and has been very pleased with the features and the quality of pictures.

Reviews.Title: nikon s9300 avoid at all costs
Reviews.Author: zeczeczeczec
Reviews.Content: The S9300 is a terrible camera. Pictures are blurry, out fo focus, extremely slow shutter speed. I can't believe they put their name on and released such a bad piece of equipment. I thought it felt like it was better built than some of the competitor cameras in the store, but the photos are awful.

Reviews.Title: Useless Zoom
Reviews.Author: Jeff Yonkman
Reviews.Content: The 18x Zoom on this camera is useless. If I could I would return it. When you zoom in the camera shakes so bad that it is impossible to snap a picture.

Reviews.Title: my new Nikon camera
Reviews.Author: Cynthia J. Wilbur
Reviews.Content: I HAVENT HAD MUCH TIME TO USE MY CAMERA BUT I PLAYED AROUND WITH IT & TOOK A FEW PRACTICE PICTURES & SO FAR I LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: Great value for the money
Reviews.Author: M Neely
Reviews.Content: I enjoy this camera for everyday use.  It has a large screen on the back and is fairly user friendly.  There is nearly no internal storage for photos and the screen can get scratched if you don't put it in a case after use. Focusing is fairly quick and reliable too.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera, Good Pictures
Reviews.Author: Jean E.
Reviews.Content: Good camera.  I was able to start taking amazing pictures right after I received it.Very good camera, easy to handle.Very good option considering machine and price.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix
Reviews.Author: cynthia cash
Reviews.Content: The husband loves the camera and I have not heard a single complaint since he started using the new camera

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Ray Kula
Reviews.Content: I think it's good, so far I'm too ignorant to know if it's a good or bad camera, my pics look great and my videos are good too

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: W. Lee Oliver "beauty lover"
Reviews.Content: I chose this camera  because I've bought Nikon before and I was hoping to see that it was poweredby double A batteries and was a little crestfallen to find it powered by a rechargeable, I decided oh wellwhy not give it a try and I was surprised to find that this battery holds a charge very well and for quite a long timeSo given the other specs of this camera I decided it was a nice trade-off on this type of battery

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the money
Reviews.Author: Peter Brunton
Reviews.Content: I'm happy with this camera.  It has everything you'd need at this price point.  I did a lot of research on the competition and this seemed like the best value for the money.2 gripes:- When doing multiple shots it takes a little bit of time to record the image which means if there is another shot you want to take quickly, then your outta luck.- Your finger naturally rests on top of where the flash pops up.  You take the pic and it says it cant cos the flash is malfunctioning.  Hmmm. That's a design flaw for user experience.But I'm happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Mitsi Jazmin Rodriguez Reyes
Reviews.Content: It has worked well. I like it.The price was good for this type of camera.It has a very good zooming

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Granny
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little camera ,if you don't want the expense of buying additional lenses. Don't expect the same results as a full frame camera, but for the size and price it's a great buy and a great little camera !

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: Moncho
Reviews.Content: This brand is characterized by good cameras take photos always meets my expectations I will continue always relying on the brand Nikon

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: marsha porterfield
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure if the camera is too sensitive for me or what. The pictures I took with the zoom lens all turned out blurry.  I'm taking a trip soon to a place where many animals will be in the wild and I wanted a good zoom feature. I returned the camera. I also didn't like the power on/off. Very small and difficult to use.  Size of camera is great and I really liked the fact that when in sun you can still see the subject through the viewfinder.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Maureen
Reviews.Content: Glad I bought it; it fit into my pocketbook easily and was great to have on my vacation.  Great camera

Reviews.Title: Dont know what Nikon was thinking.
Reviews.Author: tony moss
Reviews.Content: But then again I read the reviews before my purchase. You can feel the battery get hot. And yes.....the flash pop up is pain.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: J&M;
Reviews.Content: Still learning about all this camera can do.  It is a bit larger than the Coolpix it replaced; but still a comfortable and easy size to carry.  Other reviews mentioned noise, time needed after flash is used.  They were correct, but these things don't annoy me.  I like the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: DWray
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Easy to use. Lots of features. Compact size. A go anywhere camera! Takes great photos. Lightweight. Love the self-closing lens.

Reviews.Title: Perfect pics
Reviews.Author: Jorge Ruales
Reviews.Content: The camera has a really good 18 x zoom.. the quality of the pics is nice and the camera has some good effects

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Omar
Reviews.Content: It is a very nice digital camera, I think that its photos are great, the resolution is excellent, I recived on time and the seller showed it. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Nikon is great
Reviews.Author: anna e.
Reviews.Content: they could try to make the directions plainer as I am new to taking pictures and I think the emblems are to small but that is me. It is a great item and I hope to have a lot of fun with it.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Gibson
Reviews.Content: Its a lot better than I expected and I love what it does with effects and the zoom is great. The quality is a lot better than my old camera. Greatest camera ever. I would recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: very clear pictures and movies
Reviews.Author: fortlaud1
Reviews.Content: this is about my 5 HD movie camera and 4 16 mega pixel camera and it works just like is shouldI did have to return 2 fujis F600 because they could not focus everwhich was very disappointing to me since I liked that camera had Fuji before which worked greatI also had a Nikon before and that is why I bought another onethe price was very good since its a model that is most likely going away which is fine with meI am very happy with it

Reviews.Title: poor quality
Reviews.Author: Xiaofei Lu
Reviews.Content: poor quality pictures to begin with, and, worst of all, it stopped responding after only 7 months with very light use.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: mr j
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera as temporary replacement for a broken Fuji. Took it on vacation and I am stunned at the quality of the pictures . Even I a dark nightclub, it showed colors in hd. The flash is capable. I am keeping this baby. My brother took it on vacation and is under threat of harm if it is not returned. Especially great with the sdxc memory card. Get the extra batteries if you intend to take a lot of videos. Only down is the slow processor even in bright daylight. was worth the money. Hope they have a new model. will look into that.

Reviews.Title: it`s work
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Reyes
Reviews.Content: This product met my expectations fully recommend it 100% It is a pleasure for me to capture special moments with my new camera nikon

Reviews.Title: Nice Zoom
Reviews.Author: maha
Reviews.Content: Small in size, nice zoom,nice pictures in the dark, good quality video. nice camera for travel quality pictures and very  nice video

Reviews.Title: CoolPix S9200
Reviews.Author: Bernie
Reviews.Content: Perfect for the type of photographer I am.  Easy to work and just the right size. Great viewing screen size.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: roberto
Reviews.Content: I love it.Easy to use, very good quality pictures, great optical zoomIt meets my expectation...i love to take macro pictures...

Reviews.Title: Many manufaturing, engineering or design issues.
Reviews.Author: Heft
Reviews.Content: Camera does not operate smoothly. Lens makes grinding noise when it tries to focus. Takes blurry pictures as others have stated in their reviews.

Reviews.Title: Nifty
Reviews.Author: Gail Holcombe
Reviews.Content: We lost our other camera and finally decided to get this one. We are so glad we purchased it. Takes great pictures. Fits in my purse easily. And easy to use!

Reviews.Title: Not the greatest
Reviews.Author: Bilson Foster
Reviews.Content: With all the new tech. & features it seems some newer products gets worse than older models. I have a Nikon Coolpix 7900 and at 7MP the picture quality is way better than the S9200. Customization is very limited compared to the 7900 as well. I hope Nikon improves on their future models.  I have only purchased Nikon cameras and in addition to these I also own the D80 as well which I was thinking of upgrading as well to the D7100 which is now giving me second thoughts 'cause i'm very picky about my pictures.

Reviews.Title: Very beautiful and functional camera.
Reviews.Author: Sergio Savarese
Reviews.Content: The Nikon brand is synonymous of quality. Easy to use, very good quality pictures and very nice design. Excellent value for money.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: William H. Oconnor "Bill"
Reviews.Content: Pictures are clear and Video is clear. Battery lasts a long time. If you use the Video feature it tends to drain battery quicker.  Used it on a Disney World trip . Fits right in front pocket.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera
Reviews.Author: R. Watson "Baboo"
Reviews.Content: I've only used it a few times but everything I have to say wod be positive. Easy to use and pictures come out nice. I wouldn't say the quality blew me away, but it's worthy of 4 stars.Still playing around with all the features, but do far I like many of the options. I've done some panoramic and some playing around with color features.By the way, the zoom is excellent. It takes a good quality shot when zooming in.

Reviews.Title: Broke second day had it!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Worked great for two days then out of nowhere it suddenly stopped working,  never dropped or anything! Won't speak bad for all nikon just be weary, may get a dud like mine

Reviews.Title: Super pics and who needs GPS tagging in the more expensive s9300?
Reviews.Author: Bill Adams
Reviews.Content: I have found the camera to be very versatile.  It yields rich pics and wtih the 16 megapixel. there is plenty of opportunity to blow up images.  The 18x zoom is a great feature as well.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: TheJobinator
Reviews.Content: I have taken this camera on several trips and I love how compact it is as well as the picture quality! My only complaint is with my sunglasses on, the screen turns black when the camera is turned to portrait... weird. I love Nikon products and will continue to buy them.

Reviews.Title: Things going wrong
Reviews.Author: lee
Reviews.Content: After tinkering with the settings on the S-9300, I got it to take pretty nice shots. Photos is the reason for buying it. But a few days ago, I wanted to test out the movie feature... it does not work! According to the manual, you just push the record button in any picture mode and it starts recording. I bought a class 10 memory card, so it should do movies just fine.Than yesterday my "Playback" button goes off-line. After trying every button combo and menu option, I decided the thing is just not going to work any longer.what to do? Send it in to be repaired? Per other feedback, this could take a while. Will I buy another Nikon product... most likely not.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Photo Quality
Reviews.Author: Summers Acres
Reviews.Content: Excellent photo quality for the price. I just cannot take the leap to a more advanced camera and wanted a really good point and shoot. Optical zoom is great!

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: TopCat
Reviews.Content: Love the battery life, size and ease of use. However, the picture quality isn't what I am expecting after having Nikons my whole life. It could be a little more crisp.

Reviews.Title: Amazing photos!
Reviews.Author: JanS
Reviews.Content: My friends were impressed with the photos taken- they compared them to the photos they took with larger, more expensive cameras. A bit heavier than the 10X zoom but worth the weight for the ability to capture photos from a distance.

Reviews.Title: Overall a very good camera
Reviews.Author: D. JANECKE
Reviews.Content: Very nice menu's and very easy to operate. The HD movies are simply amazing. The only thing I don't like is when fully zoomed out, that is "wide angle", there is very noticeable fish eye distortion to the image around the outer edges. I guess there are limits.

Reviews.Title: Slow with broken lens cover.
Reviews.Author: Nawerd
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera about two months ago. The lens cover that opens automatically on start up lasted about a week before it wouldn't retract all the way. This would leave a small corner cut off when zoomed all the way out. This camera is also sluggish and slow all around and only takes mediocre pictures without good contrast or color saturation. I would not recommend this camera to anyone. The only reason for the higher price is for the geo tags, which are great, but not if the photos are so dead.

Reviews.Title: This is just what I wanted in a camera
Reviews.Author: Ramona Blee
Reviews.Content: The price was  right on this product and the qualit is excellent.  I would recommend it for any amateur photographer such as myself.

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: Francisco J. Munoz S "Ornitomax"
Reviews.Content: Now I can shut great quality pictures! Excelent resolution. All I can expect from a digital camera and arrived in excellent condition.

Reviews.Title: Great Camara
Reviews.Author: Michael R. Thomas "matt thomas"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use for the starter camara and multiple functions that give high quality images. Nice to have only one to carry on a trip for both pictures and great video.

Reviews.Title: Not too bad.
Reviews.Author: Shanpingshi "Sam"
Reviews.Content: The product is OK as they described, but Nikon product has less function than canon. I don't know why sometime the picture were blur, but we still use the 16 MP camera now.Recently,with other customer's question, I found my camera package does not have the cable use to connect between camera and wall charger. Be careful, when you buy this camera,should looking at the package thoroughly,don't missing something like me.I did send a message now, and waiting for the seller's feedback.Update:*:The company send to the missing cable in two weeks.

Reviews.Title: Best camera I ever used.
Reviews.Author: Joseph E. Grimm
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality, easy to understand and operate.  I like the wide angle lens that allow me to shoot product installations in tight aresa

Reviews.Title: Such a deal!
Reviews.Author: SirGeorge
Reviews.Content: So far, I'm not disappointed in the quality and handiness of the Nikon S9200. It captures images with great sharpness, which was the complaint I had with a point-and-shoot made by Canon that also came through Amazon. I like the large screen, the instant availability of HD Video (for when that alien spacecraft hovers over my house), and the feel of quality. I set the self-timer and placed the camera on a solid surface in very dim lighting conditions. After watching it think and take a long exposure, i was amazed at the results. As a long-time Leica user, I am quite satisfied with the quality.

Reviews.Title: A surprise
Reviews.Author: Raymond A. Thorne "razor"
Reviews.Content: For the money, this camera is excellent. The quality of the photos are exceptional. I am impressed with the zoom and the ability to get physically close with the same camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Grilliette
Reviews.Content: I wanted a point and shoot with zoom.  That is what this is.  The pictures are nice, and the camera is easy to use.  For what it is designed for, this is a very nice camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera!!
Reviews.Author: A. Reyes
Reviews.Content: I was undecided whether to buy a Nikon or Sony, I am fond of Sony products, but also I was knowledge that Nikon was good too. I bought this camera and I am pleased. The image on the screen very sharp, has automatic scenes that fit to the environment, real stereo sound, 18x objective that captures distant images with excellent sharpness.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: JOSE LARREA
Reviews.Content: Hasta la fecha, una cámara espectacular. Todavía no he utilizado todo el potencial que tiene. Muy buena compra, recomendable para los aficionados e incluso mas

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Oswaldo Bejarano
Reviews.Content: I really like the multiple available options it has. Life battery depends on the resolution and quality of the pictures and other options like sounds when focusing. I had to change to 4MP photos and removed the sound when focusing for a battery duration of 1 day and a half.In general is a very good camera, but sometimes when I switched it off too quick after taking a photo, it get stucked and the only way to reboot it was to remove the battety and put it again.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: GristMillFarm
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Heavier than my older/smaller Coolpix, but the zoom is great and the pictures excellent. Only disadvantage is no printed manual, so you have to download an print your own copy to understand all its features.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX
Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: Love it - price was great & it's just the camera I have been looking for - so glad I bought it

Reviews.Title: Didn't liked
Reviews.Author: bijoy
Reviews.Content: I don't know if i got a bad copy or something. I had issue with the camera shutter and had problem with charging. send it back and got it repaired. Pictures are ok at day light. I wont recommend this to my friends

Reviews.Title: So far so good...
Reviews.Author: Lori M. Nickels "my kid's mom"
Reviews.Content: Took it to trip to cancun.  So far so good.  Still have minor issues with focusing and speed of taking the next picture.  Outdoor shots are spectacular, some indoor ones are just good, and night time shots are, well, thats what I need to work out.  Flash pops up when I don't see the need, so I have to hold it down sometimes.  Snapshot button moved compared to my old Coolpix, which is annoying and getting use to it still. Love the size- fits perfect in my Vera Bradley tech case.  Hopefully the ease of use improves as I test it out this summer!Wish the uploading program to view pictures was better - would like to add texts to some pictures, and this does not have that feature.  Doesn't seem to organize my pictures well like the Kodak and Olympus programs did. I should invest in an Adobe or Photoshop program I guess.

Reviews.Title: Excelente Machine
Reviews.Author: Jose Luis
Reviews.Content: impossible to get it better. It is simply amazing, if you need a good camera this is what you are looking for.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix
Reviews.Author: M. S. Coppola "Susan Coppola"
Reviews.Content: My first Coolpix was a 995, a whole 3 Mega Pixels. This little baby at 16Mega Pixels and Video is perfect for my purse. I mostly use the Nikon D7000 SLR. But I have to say the photos I can take with this point & shoot can stand up to tthe SLR.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: bbennett
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a gift. The recipient is very happy with it. I also have a Nikon Coolpix and like it.

Reviews.Title: Liked, but wished it had STL..................
Reviews.Author: Blue & Gray 29er
Reviews.Content: Just out of the box, took a few photos and some video. All seem to work well and easy to use. Would have preferred STL, but it is hard to fined today on smaller cameras.

Reviews.Title: Bad resolution
Reviews.Author: Yvonne Tejada
Reviews.Content: I dont like this camera.  Nikon Coolpix 8200 is much better than this Coolpix 9200.  Pictures dont have a good resolution even the specifications of the camera indicate a very good one.  I had to return the camera.

Reviews.Title: Its good in this price
Reviews.Author: Ashoksingh Dhami
Reviews.Content: this product is good for a normal users. the best thing is zoom and picture clarity. go for it, no need to think alot.

Reviews.Title: great quality for the price
Reviews.Author: Denise
Reviews.Content: this camera its super cool and very light weight all you need is to use the right settings and you can click amazing pictures i love it and i recommended you won't be disappointed very worth to buy

Reviews.Title: after one month it was died
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: this is good camera but it was died may be procesor. you must bay s 3000 or nothing for nikon if you want little camera, if you want quality semi pro you must bay nikon D5000

Reviews.Title: Not Good,
Reviews.Author: TPatel
Reviews.Content: It is not good camera, Colors really fed up, Out of Focus when it is zoom in, too sensitive to vibration during zoom, Screen display is really bad, Blur pictures, Pictures looks like of 5 MP rather than 16 MP

Reviews.Title: Battery burnt up on the first 20 minute video!
Reviews.Author: Duane Staley
Reviews.Content: I was looking forward to this camera.  It was on sale at Amazon for $149 so I just couldn't pass it up.  When I took the first video, it shut off and the screen read "battery hot."  It shut off automatically.  About a week later, I tried again to take a video, and after about 20 minutes, the same thing happened.  This time, I was unable to retrieve the video off of the card, it was gone completely.  And now the 16G card says the card is unreadable or something like that.  Amazon said I was 3 days too late to return it for a refund.  So I'm contacting Nikon and they won't send a refund either, but will consider replacing it when I send it it.  I really wish they would refund me, but will have to settle for a replacement IF they replace it.  Not sure what they are going to do about the 16G card I bought with it.  So this camera has overheat issues.  And if you send it back for a refund, be sure to do it within 30 days of your purchase.  Don't wait 33 days like it did.

Reviews.Title: my best camera.
Reviews.Author: Erick Sebastián Amanqui Cuti
Reviews.Content: Probaly this is the best pocketcamera, i dont need a gps, and the Price was so good, thanks for everything

Reviews.Title: great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: T. L. Peat
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera. It's easy to use and operate holds a charge for a good deal of time too.

Reviews.Title: nikon s9200
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Gummersall
Reviews.Content: if you've used nikon products before, this is an easy to use, great camera. It doesn't have great motion shots.

Reviews.Title: Good.
Reviews.Author: Hannah
Reviews.Content: This one is really good to use and take pictures! I like it and I recommand this stuff to my friends too!!

Reviews.Title: New camara
Reviews.Author: Jan Ucieklak
Reviews.Content: My new Nikon is totally satisfactory for my needs. Of course it is not SLR, but for a compact camera is very good. Takes great close-up pictures, great panoramic futures. Over all I am very satisfied with this unit. My previous camera Canon, was good, but Nikon is better. Battery life is much longer. It is small enough that I can carry in my pocket. I am completely satisfied.Thank you Nikon for making something affordable.

Reviews.Title: slow, easily broken
Reviews.Author: Geoff Woodcock "chicken plucker"
Reviews.Content: I have yet to find a mode that takes pictures quickly. The first day I had the camera, the metal piece around the lens came off and can't be put back on. Guess I'll have to take it to the shop. Also, the battery door CONSTANTLY pops open, and the selector know gets moved about every time I put the camera in my pocket. annoying.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: aden
Reviews.Content: love it..its not true all the bad comments here..its the people who knows to use the camera,to use the settings and everything about the camera..i have no problem on it..

Reviews.Title: Always Nikon
Reviews.Author: Grey Havens
Reviews.Content: I have been shooting Nikon camera's since the 35mm days. This camera is excellent and takes very high quality photos and videos. I bought it before my daughter was born to preserve the memories and it was worth every dime.

Reviews.Title: Nice and less money
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: I don't need GPS feature, and the price is so so reasonable w/o it!Focus and picture quality is very good

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Jim Rego
Reviews.Content: The camera has a remarkable zoom,and easy to operate right out of the box! A great camera to carry with you.

Reviews.Title: It's very good
Reviews.Author: jinxing
Reviews.Content: It can take photo for something in a long distence due to it's long focus lens.and the photo is very clear.

Reviews.Title: Not Happy With This Camera
Reviews.Author: smitty
Reviews.Content: Received this camera about a month ago and used it on a trip out of the country. I probably took about 500 photos with the camera and it took ok photos. When I got home I turned the camera on and got an error message that said "Mode dial is not in the proper position." Has not worked since. I turn the camera on ~ I get the same message ~ and it shuts off. The camera is useless at this point. So, I returned the camera for a full refund. They wanted to know if I wanted to replace the camera with the same product, I said "No Thanks!"First Nikon Camera ~ not sure if I will try them again.

Reviews.Title: Nikon digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Ellen glatzer shechter
Reviews.Content: Looked into all sorts of cameras and found that this was the best for me at the right price. will reccomend it.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix S9200
Reviews.Author: Rochelle Small
Reviews.Content: This camera did everything it said it did.  Compact yet not so small it cannot be handled.  Lens extension is a little scary at long focus but the picture quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Great upgrade
Reviews.Author: A. Page
Reviews.Content: Our S8100 bit the dust in the Gulf of Mexico, so we had to get a new camera.  Basically, this camera is the same one, just upgraded with a larger screen, 16 MP instead of 12, and 18X zoom instead of 10X.  They also redesigned the power button and thumb grip.  Over all, a very nice update and it was actually 60 bucks cheaper this time.

Reviews.Title: Great camera at a great price!
Reviews.Author: Gary Catron
Reviews.Content: Very compact, takes great pictures and video. Easy to use and has lots of bells and whistles. Good indoors and outdoors.

Reviews.Title: Milagros Pino
Reviews.Author: Milagros Pino
Reviews.Content: La camara es excelente a la hora de tomar fotografias, sin embargo no me gusta las forma tan brusca como sale el flash

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Margaret P. Worth
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and takes great photos.  I like the night mode for taking the moon and the wide angle for taking real estate photos.

Reviews.Title: Magic to carry in your pocket
Reviews.Author: texasFox
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Nikon CoolPix S9300 to carry in my pocket when I ride my bicycle. I did not want to have to carry a backpack in order to carry my larger camera. I especially wanted the 18x optical zoom. I'm a fairly serious amateur photographer, and I was not willing to settle for the 3-5x zooms on most pocket cameras. It DOES fit into my pocket, even the back pocket of my jeans. As compact as it is, it has more features than the camera I'm replacing. It has 16 mp, max 3200 ISO, face recognition, GPS tagging of photos, fast continuous shoot mode, HD video, and many other features. My favorite is the wonderfully easy to use panorama mode. I spent 2 or 3 days reading the manual. It will probably be a while before I can use all the features without refering to the manual.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Perladorada
Reviews.Content: Was received in very good condition and my sister is very happy with this gift. I will highly recommend this product to anyone. The price was also very good.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: BZ Shopper
Reviews.Content: Nikon, went from my 12.1 Megapixel Panasonic to this lumix and the pics are awesome..Worth buying and the pics are great.. .. thumbs up...

Reviews.Title: NIKON COOLPIX is cool camera....
Reviews.Author: Gururaj
Reviews.Content: awesome camera!! i loved it.. i bought it for my uncle.. this camera takes awesome photos. The camera features are great.and shipping is very fast!!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix s9200
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: I really like this small compact camera, except for where the flash pops up, seems to hit my finger all the time, takes fantastic photo's and has lot's of cool features, highly recomend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix camera
Reviews.Author: Claudia O'Mera
Reviews.Content: Love it, haven't really used it on any great pics yet but there are so many great views around my house since I live where there are no street lights that I am waiting for inspiration to hit me

Reviews.Title: Great pictures!
Reviews.Author: amy hills
Reviews.Content: This camera is a perfect size-small, and takes incredible pictures.  Great clarity, easy to use, and it catches the true colors.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S9200
Reviews.Author: Chris Capozzoli
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera for the price.  It takes far better photos than most cell phones.  A good choice for $150.  I did many comparisons of camera in this price range.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S9200
Reviews.Author: BARBARA SCHROEDER
Reviews.Content: This is the second camera I have like this one, bought the s8100 in 2009, both work great. I got this one since the price was so good and it has a longer zoom than my other one.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: C. Bryant
Reviews.Content: I am still learning the in and outs of my new camera but so far I love it! I had wanted a camera that when I sit on the porch I can quickly grab it and make a picture of birds on the feeder or bath and this is just perfect. Somebody told me that I needed to get a large camera with a zoom lens to get a good picture and so I did get a Nikon D7000 with a zoom lens and I do love it too but I have to take the time to get it out and put the lens on it which I often do. This camera allows me to just pick it up as I go out to sit on the porch with my cat (who never bothers the birds) and catch a good picture in a moment. They are both great cameras and do not replace the function of either but each has their own pros.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Lois Nackerud "Forever Young"
Reviews.Content: My last camera was a cool pix, and I loved it, but the zoom was only 5x.  I wanted a camera with a better zoom but it  needed to be small enough to fit in a pocket.  This fit the bill perfectly.

Reviews.Title: very good camera for its price
Reviews.Author: René Abad
Reviews.Content: This Nikon camera seems spectacular image quality in HD, also in dark areas capture good images without using the flash.The camera zoom is really good, and the price is affordable. The classify and recommend it as a semi professional camera functions provided

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My husband bought me this camera for valentines day!!! And I love it it takes great pics has a lot of different settings and is a beautiful red color I have another Nikon camera which is much bigger both are great cameras and both are beautiful red color.......Thanks Nikon for great products :)

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: MachuRay
Reviews.Content: This camera is an amazing one! Best one I've owned! Great screen plus an amazing zoom makes for a great picture!

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera!
Reviews.Author: SGibbs
Reviews.Content: As with any new eletronics it takes a bit of getting used to all the various setting and abilities of this camerabut I could not be happier. great pictures inside and out. nice big viewer screen on back and impressive zoom.great macro setting and a couple cool effects. really nice point and shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: Good camera and good price
Reviews.Author: Cecilia
Reviews.Content: I put 4 stars because I consider this camera really good for the price, I'm not an expect in this area but I think it works pretty well. One of the things I like is that it has a wide variety of effects and pretty good optical zoom

Reviews.Title: for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Karen Vetorino
Reviews.Content: My daughter was looking for a camera with a lot of megapixels and a high level telescoping.. This fit the bill perfectly and she discovered she could video with it as well which was a definite plus....

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Ann Cranford
Reviews.Content: I like the camera very much. Haven't had a lot of time to use it yet; but from the times I have, I really find it easy to use and the results terrific!!

Reviews.Title: Nice for the Price,  small issue with Auto-focus
Reviews.Author: Mario J. Bruhwiler "Buddha Boy"
Reviews.Content: I love the speed of the camera, but it does have issues with low-light:  has problems focusing automatcially, delays in shooting.Otherwise, it is a fantastic camera and does 1080p video recording that you would need to pay a high price for in the same class.

Reviews.Title: Cool pix S9300 review
Reviews.Author: Diane Harto
Reviews.Content: I really like most of the features.  I do have some issues with the digital zoom because of it's poor pic quality.  It's also too shaky

Reviews.Title: Great zoom and extras on camera
Reviews.Author: kmc
Reviews.Content: The 18x zoom is great, but sometimes photos are fuzzy if you're trying to zoom in on something small, like a bird far away. But other times I've had great luck with the zoom and the photos.  I like the extras you can add after a photo is taken, such as fisheye and star cross.  This camera is also good for close ups.  However, it is not very fast at focusing, so you may lose some shots if something happens fast. I haven't used the feature for speed yet.  I really like the camera, the photos are clear and crisp, the colors are perfect. The problems are probably user error on my part.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: EN
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures.  All the features I required plus some.  I really like how Nikon changed the way you take panoramic pictures.  Much easier than it was.  Only one negative - it seems to react a little slower than my former S8000, but it's not that bad.

Reviews.Title: Solid camera, slightly larger than expected, would prefer external charger
Reviews.Author: Fish
Reviews.Content: Easy to use menu, good optics (depth of field). Very long lens and good wide angle. Moderate amount of configurability in options. The only downsides as I see it are that:-No external charger - batteries have to be charged within the camera (not convenient if you want to have more than one battery and swap), unlike my Panasonic Lumix cameras.-The body is larger than the comparable Canon and Panasonic.The flash on this pops up as needed. Where my hand naturally falls on the body my finger covers up the flash - keeping it from popping up. Not a real problem - but something you have to get used to which is different from comparable models.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: C. A. Gianopoulos "ChefGus"
Reviews.Content: Not what I wanted. Need to buy a faster camera. Just to slow can't take pictures fast enough for a very mobile toddler.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: BasicTek "Tim"
Reviews.Content: This is the 1st camera I've bought in quite some time, so far I have only utilized some basic features. I have to say it takes amazing pictures, it's very fast, and the zoom is awesome. For just over a hundred bucks you really can't go wrong. Other similar models are much hiugher (9300) for GPS feature only which wasn't even something I wanted. I was looking for a great quality camera with excellent zoom, and didn't want to spend a lot of money.

Reviews.Title: great point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Yousong Mei
Reviews.Content: Bought the camera before my trip and very happy with zoom capability. It is light and picture quality is great. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Camera is okay, glad I got a good price or I would be disappointed.
Reviews.Author: Perrymom3
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed with this camera the first time I used it. All the pictures were coming out blurry. We played around with the settings a bit & now it takes clear pictures. I think the camera should have came "ready to use". I should not of had to play with the settings in order to get a clear picture. I also don't like were the flash pops up. I always for get & my finger gets in the way. But it is a good camera despite these flaws. I will get used to it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Ellis W Olson
Reviews.Content: I carry this camera in the car for immediate use when I don't have my Nikon D7000 with me. The wide range in zoom is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: GOOD PRICE
Reviews.Author: CONNIE BRADY
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A GREAT CAMERA FOR THE PRICE TAKES GOOD SNAP SHOTS,REALLY ENJOYED IT AT XMAS TAKING FAMILEY PICTURES WOULD BUY AGAIN

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jeanie
Reviews.Content: It has such sharp, clear pictures!!!  Zoom in's don't look fuzzy, like they used to.My sister bought one after seeing mine.

Reviews.Title: Battery :-(
Reviews.Author: Amy D Dirkse
Reviews.Content: It took great pictures for my daughters gymnastics meet.  The only thing was after only 100 or so pics the battery died and I didn't even have the flash on.  Needless to say I missed a lot of pics.

Reviews.Title: S9300 Review
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I took a few photos with this camera and some the bodies in the photos are not proportionate and it is a little larger than I would like.

Reviews.Title: nice camera.
Reviews.Author: Robin Barreto
Reviews.Content: Doesn't focus as great as i thought.  You have to play with all the buttons on it to focus. It's okay for the price

Reviews.Title: try it
Reviews.Author: Tuyet Anh T Dam
Reviews.Content: I like this product because it is help me to take a picture from far with18x Zoom.It's cheap. If you want a camera buy it now.

Reviews.Title: It just perfect.
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: This camera takes beautiful pictures. I love the features.The screen size is very good.The battery last long. I took a lot of pictures.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: DAVID FINFER
Reviews.Content: Love it, easy to use and takes great pictures and the sound on the video is great, its clear and loud

Reviews.Title: Convenience ,love it
Reviews.Author: Lizette Velez
Reviews.Content: I found what I was looking for,I love it.It's slim,take on vacation,and take beautiful pictures,easy too used ,don't need to be a professional,

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: I'm not an expert by a long shot, but this camera seems like it's a winner.  Great resolution, and the optical zoom is excellent for a camera this size.  If you are looking for a smaller camera with bigger camera zoom etc. then I would recomend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S9300 - OK, not great
Reviews.Author: Becky
Reviews.Content: The only thing I don't like is the pop up flash.  It is right where you put your finger to hold the camera.  I'm afraid it's going to break because I forget to move my finger.  This is a major flaw.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Jodi
Reviews.Content: Easy to carry in my purse, easy to use, I own a bigger all out Nikon witch I love but hard to have on me all the time so I wanted something small to have with me all the time love Nikon so went with this one, so far so good takes great pics and love that I can zoom in and get the other shots, great buy.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera!
Reviews.Author: Rccullison
Reviews.Content: Compact and easy to use. Lots of nice features. Great little camera for taking pictures of our new grand baby. (:

Reviews.Title: Nice and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Mosey
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera to use for on the go pictures. I've been taking great photos with it since I received it. The camera is easy to use and takes good photos of people and landscapes. The auto exposure has been quite good so far and has not required to much work in Photoshop. The photos transfer into Nikontansfer or Photoshop without any issues. This is a good camera for the money. But, I'm not giving up my DSLR yet.

Reviews.Title: Lightweight
Reviews.Author: POL
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a camera that was better than phone but not bulky.  This model is perfect. great qaulity pictures and lightweight

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for the price
Reviews.Author: W.M.T.
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning about all of the features in this little camera.  It is perfect size to place in my pocket, yet is takes clear pictures.

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice
Reviews.Author: Patrick Eminian
Reviews.Content: Great camera a lot of cool fetures my girl friend loves it.  She took a ton of pictures during thre holidays and printed them amazing quality

Reviews.Title: Best Compact Coolpix Yet!
Reviews.Author: Ravin' Mad
Reviews.Content: I bought the 9300 to replace my Coolpix L5 which I primarily used for hiking and social events.  I like the very compact size (it fits in my Osprey carrying case), the intuitiveness of the menu system, the selector dial (L5 did not have this, but my Nikon P100 does), and of course, the panorama capability, GPS function, and the increased pixels.  I was a bit leery of some of the reviews complaining about focusing issues when using zoom.  I tested it in the store and found no problems.  I usually don't take it past optical zoom (which is clearly marked).  I tested it on a hike and the pictures came out great at full optical zoom with vibration reduction turned on.  The zoom photos from my old L5 (which I loved), would often have a scattering of blank pixels when I went to edit in iPhoto -- visible when digitally zooming in iPhoto.  The 9300 did not have this.  I played with the zoom in autofocus at close range -- about 25 feet -- and found that I could run through the focusing spectrum and the camera automatically focused correctly when I took the picture.  I just cannot duplicate the complaint.  My landscapes turned out great.I tried night photos -- I use a tripod, the timer, and turn vibration control off -- great results!  I have also taken photos of the bright full moon (same method, scenery>landscape, and exposure set to -2.0) and the photos turn out sharp.  I have enlarged and printed some of my L5 photos up to 18X24 with terrific results.  Since the S9300 photos are of much higher quality, I assume they will be even better.GPS -- Love it.  In iPhoto it displays a map and puts a red dot where the picture was taken.  No problem syncing with the GPS satellites at all.Panorama is too smooth! Select 180 or 360 degrees.  Depress the button and release and then pan steadily to the right.  The camera stops when you have completed the arc.  You can then review the photo.  Wow!On winter hikes I wear light gloves.  I can still operate the 9300 controls without any problem.I practiced facial recognition with faces in the viewfinder and it worked fine (as it did on the L5).  My cat pictures even turned out great, too, though I didn't use facial recognition!The S9300 is easy to carry and use.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: amazing picture quality and the zoom is incredible
Reviews.Author: Biff
Reviews.Content: I've read reviews on here saying it takes too long to start up and load to take a picture/focus. Well truthfully it does take like 3 or 4 seconds but to me that really does not matter. If you are going on trips demanding fast picture taking you should probably buy a professional grade camera. But if you are just going to use this as a normal everyday camera it's awesome. The video is an incredible 1080p and capturing videos playing them back is great.

Reviews.Title: great deal, great camera,
Reviews.Author: JoAn
Reviews.Content: Have not used it too much--seems to have lots of features, which are easy to use. My last camera was a 1981 Pentax, 35mm, so needless to say, this dinosaur is still coming out of the pre-historic era into the 21 century!!

Reviews.Title: This new CoolPix Didn't Disappoint!
Reviews.Author: Cami D.
Reviews.Content: My very first digital camera was an earlier version of the CoolPix cameras and I loved it, my husband still uses it for in car camera when he races.  I also have a larger Nikon D70 that still takes awesome shots, however, it is too large to take with me on some trips.  So my husband bought me this newer CoolPix model for Christmas.  I'm still playing with it, but it appears to have all of the main features I'm looking for with a great 18x zoom, 16MP, HD 1080p video, etc. in a very convenient size for great portability. The only thing missing for me is a rapid motion setting which I find rather limiting.  Other than that a great little camera!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: NikonWarrior
Reviews.Content: I snagged this guy up when it went on sale on Anazon...one of my best camera buys. I would say it is worth its original price too. Pictures are nice for a compact, not too slow, and perfect for travel. Cant wait to use it in Argentina!

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Jody
Reviews.Content: What a bargain!  Lots of bells and whistles but you can also just point and shoot.  Great pics so far but I have not tried printing anything yet.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: MJ MAYOR
Reviews.Content: amazing camera...battery life super long and a lot of cool features....Perfect pictures and really easy to use, the camere guides you

Reviews.Title: Good pictures, but slow to take them
Reviews.Author: Hyacinth Williams
Reviews.Content: This camera take great high quality pictures. However, it takes a while for a picture to be taken because it take a long time for the camera to focus and take the ideal picture. It then can take a while before you are able to tale the next photo. As a result you can miss important moment that you wanted to save forever.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: kakha
Reviews.Content: Nikon COOLPIX S9200 149$ in its prise is the best prodact!!!!!!! i love it and its takes very good pics

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Peggy J Rector
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased for my husband as a Christmas present and he loves it.  Makes great pictures and video's.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use camera
Reviews.Author: fran Carey
Reviews.Content: A very easy to use camera, even for a novice like me.  One flaw with design in the flash.  I constantly hold my finger over the flash, the flash needs a different design.

Reviews.Title: Nikon S9200
Reviews.Author: tim weisse
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. The only difference between it and the Nikon S9300 is the S9200 does noy have GPS, or the additional cost for having it.  I bought the for $140... not bad for a 16mp 18x zoom with a large CMOS sensor and ad a 900k dot monitor.  Pictures out side are no problem, but inside in lower light the camera seems to have a bit of trouble getting focused, even with the focus assist beam enabled.  It is a bit more compact than I thought, sof if you have large hands or prefer a camera of substantive size, keep looking.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: gail verplanck
Reviews.Content: Iam still try to learn how to work the camera. I dont understand the flash part. for me it is a work inprogress

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Erick Escobar-evans "3Es Erick"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a replacement for a stolen S9100 and I gotta say I was disappointed, the turn on time is very slow, the flash pops up automatically and you cannot pull it out manually. the auto focus seemed to take forever to focus and compared to the s9100 I guess I was just expecting a lil bit more or maybe the same. The pictures that I did take where good quality and looked very nice, but I was so annoyed with the camera that I didn't take that many.If you just take pictures in full auto settings then no problem, but if you like to mess around with settings you're better off with a Canon on the same price range.overall, decent camera but not up to my expectations

Reviews.Title: The Nikon COLPIX S9300 has great features
Reviews.Author: Emily Branscome
Reviews.Content: This camera gives you a lot for the money, especially the 18x zoom, and the pocket-fitting size, and of course it takes wonderful pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S9200 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Guy David
Reviews.Content: The camera is great. I was pleasantly surprised that the camera was so small, but it works great. I was able to get some very good close ups of my grandson during the holidays. The quality of the pictures and the ease of use make this a great camera to own.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera.
Reviews.Author: La Mer
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use, takes beautiful pictures and is light weight and easy to carry.  The instruction manual was straight forward and easy (even for me) to understand.  I love it.

Reviews.Title: Seems to be a good camera for what we want to use it for.
Reviews.Author: Jill
Reviews.Content: Seems to take good pics.  Easy to use.  So far, so good.  Haven't used it a lot.  The test will be next week at the races.

Reviews.Title: the best camera
Reviews.Author: martin schmidt
Reviews.Content: this is one of the best camera I have ever owed. the camera does everthing by its self it is a excellent camera

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Ian Scofield "Warcat"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera to replace an old Fuji I have had for 5 years.  At first I was hesitant to get such a small point and shoot camera to replace my bigger feature packed point and shoot.  When I looked at it at the store though the camera was great and had a lot of features.  I purchased it that day and have yet to regret it.People who complain about soft or fuzzy pictures, try adjusting the settings.  I have found that some pictures turn out soft or fuzzy but if you find the right settings or presets that fixes everything.One of my favorite features is the panorama.  You just hold down the shutter button and you can take either a full 360 or a 180 panorama.  I have used this to take pictures of my apartment to send to family and even to take pictures at a work retreat to get the whole crew in.The wide angle lens is quite great.  To take our team photo at the end of our work retreat we had both my camera and the work camera up on a ledge and set on a timer.  The work camera was only able to catch half the group and took some finagling to even get to take the picture.  Instead with my S9300 hit the timer button select ten seconds, set it down, it got everyone in the picture with hardly any set up.  Didn't even turn in to one of those family photos where one person is running to their spot.  I had plenty of time to get to my spot.  The one feature that would have been nice in this case is to have a remote.The selective color feature is also quite nice.  You just select said feature on the effects menu and scroll through a list of colors to select a specific color and everything but that color is turned into black and white.  No need to go and Photoshop the picture anymore!I only paid 199 for this camera (plus tax and the SquareTrade Warranty) so it is well worth the investment.

Reviews.Title: Christmas present
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it . Thinking of buying one for me...will look into it later.. the camera takes awesome pictures

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix was a great pick.
Reviews.Author: Diane patten
Reviews.Content: I have only had this camera for three weeks but so far I am very satisfied.  Photos are clear, camera is easy to focus.  I like the recharging procedures and the same cord is used for connecting to a computer to download. Still getting used to the flash popping up automatically when needed. The zoom is also clear and fast.The video is clear, sound is great.  Works well when an unexpected event happens that you would like to keep

Reviews.Title: Great compact to supplement DSLR
Reviews.Author: David Prominski
Reviews.Content: Same great camera without the battery draining GPS of S9300.  Needed a compact camera to take places that my Nikon D5100 DSLR couldn't go.

Reviews.Title: Nikon S9300
Reviews.Author: Peter Djwa
Reviews.Content: Haven't had a chance to fully understand its intricacies and to use it properly, particularly because the manual comes in a disc, which is difficult and awkward to use. I have ordered a printed copy and hopefully this will help a lot.

Reviews.Title: SEMI PRO CAMERA dirt cheap
Reviews.Author: C. J. Clavadetscher "quickshot carl"
Reviews.Content: I have a CANON G 10, and had a DSLR outfit, two bodies, five lenses, a big bag, until I foisted the suitcase on my daughter and her husband. I now have two cameras with viewfinders and accessory hot shoes and super lenses and internal electronics and they are both (very sophisticated) point and shoot cameras. Heavy compared with the less sophisticated P&S; cameras out, but that is nothing considering the full range of pictures and lens/picture quality. Awesome camera, totally competitive with the G10.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: Kim Strike
Reviews.Content: Excellent Camera, another friend told me about it. Broght it for my daughterwho had a new baby and now they can enjoy these times

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX  is AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Denie Ann
Reviews.Content: The HD coloring is so awesome......................All my photo's look so professional I'm elated. I found the camera very easy to use and handle. Haven't as yet had a chance to use the Movie Maker but am looking forward to it. So if ur  looking for new technology in a HD camera Nikon Coolpix is the one to buy. The 18xzoom is great for my love of the leaves when they change color and the  snow when it's falling. Buy one and see for yourself.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Texas Lady "Laura"
Reviews.Content: My daughter-in-law LOVED getting this for Christmas.  She takes alot of pictures and this one seemed perfect for the price.  I also looked it up in Consumer Reports and it had a great rating.

Reviews.Title: Horrible autofocus in low light.
Reviews.Author: Frank Orlando "FrankO"
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a camera that could go the distance literally. With generous zoom, this Nikon feels good, easy to see display and best of all, has a dedicated movie button. This was important to us because we have a newborn in our family.UpdateReturned this camera to Amazon. The autofocus is horrible in low light. Every picture was fuzzy and disappointing. I am surprised that Nikon would put there name on this one.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Mary Lou
Reviews.Content: My son's Christmas gift and he LOVES it!  My daughter now wants one for her birthday. Zoom and video both work great.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix camera
Reviews.Author: Alvis Wilson
Reviews.Content: Works great, much better than previous cool pic cameras that I have owned. Telephoto much better than previous models that I have used.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S9300
Reviews.Author: Bo Williams
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera for the price.  Only thing that could be better is the location of the flash.  When the flash is activated it is on the top to the far left where you place your left index finger.  Takes excellent pictures and has a great zoom.  I would recommend to all my friends.

Reviews.Title: Nikon camera coolpix S9200
Reviews.Author: tjpitts
Reviews.Content: I generally like the camera.  I don't like where the flash is, but am getting used to it.  I like the zoom lens, but haven't used it too much yet.  I think it will be a good camera for me.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Thomas C Horton
Reviews.Content: This camera was a great buy overall. Only problems i had were with image focus when fully zoomed and the occasional mess up in panoramic mode. Overall one of the best point and shoot cameras ive ever used!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Samantha Rayburn
Reviews.Content: It's an excellent little thing, got it for my boyfriend for Christmas. Takes gorgeous photos. You'll love it as long as1. you are aware that the flash is in a counter-intuitive spot, there is nothing wrong with this placement it just means you need to move your finger [I don't understand reviewers who score a product badly based on where they like sticking their fingers on a device, get over it and move your finger haha]2. you don't have shaky hands, because we had an issue with blur at first [No camera is going to take great photos while you shimmy around though so again, user issue]3. you are aware of your lighting.Have fun!!

Reviews.Title: Best Camera ever own
Reviews.Author: Tom Tham
Reviews.Content: I actually return the similar comparable Samsung to Costco and purchase this one. The picture is great and the battery life is unbelievably long.  I'm very happy with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice trinket.
Reviews.Author: Leslaw Kapinos
Reviews.Content: The camera I use only for a week but I am very pleased. The compass can be traced in the field.

Reviews.Title: New Nikon Coolpix S9200 camera
Reviews.Author: Don Klynstra
Reviews.Content: So far it works great and the pictures are of very good quality. I just hope that the back glass doesn't break.

Reviews.Title: What a great quality digital camera
Reviews.Author: deltadawn
Reviews.Content: It does take a lot to learn it but once you learn how to use it, it is great. I love also the video quality and the sound is pretty good. I got this for christmas and totally happy with this product so far. It does take alot of battery when using the video. It doens't take long to charge it once you have had it charged it the first time. I have been looking for a long time and I will recommend it to any one who likes great quality pictures

Reviews.Title: Pleased so far
Reviews.Author: jam
Reviews.Content: So far so good, still learning and working with it.  Need more time to use camera. This is dumb having to put in a certain amount of words before you can submit a rating.

Reviews.Title: Made a good Christmas gift.
Reviews.Author: Jane Luttrell
Reviews.Content: My husband really enjoyed the camera at Christmas time.  He was pleased with the quality of the pictures.  We will enjoy the camera for years to come.

Reviews.Title: I lie it
Reviews.Author: julia soares
Reviews.Content: It is so easy to use and I have only one complaint, the flash is where I want to put my finger to hold the camera.  That is fine when I am useing it during the day, but it is not  enough of a problem to make me want to send it back.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera to own
Reviews.Author: Donovan
Reviews.Content: The Nikon Coolpix S9300 has so for taken very good pictures. As I am not use to having the flash located in the position that it has been placed on this camera, It will take a little time for me to get accustomed to it, but I am happy with this item so far.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: great image quality, simple and easy to use, the price was right, no much more to say on this.Thank you

Reviews.Title: Small camera performs big
Reviews.Author: Paul Beach
Reviews.Content: Has features, zoom and pic quality of much bigger cameras in a very small lightweight package. Tons of settings and great low light shooting.

Reviews.Title: Nikon 92000 great camera
Reviews.Author: michael connell
Reviews.Content: The camera works awesome, very clear pictures., great zoom, easy hardware to run, very simple to understand,Easy connection to your computer

Reviews.Title: Great camera but Nikon claims it is Gray Market!
Reviews.Author: Justin Fahmie
Reviews.Content: This camera is great. Does great video, zoom, and photos. Only issues I have is charging is via a non standard USB cable, while charging the camera has to be off. I would advise ordering one of the extra external battery chargers and extra battery. Also when I went to register on nikon website it told me my serial number was "Gray Market" which messes with warranty. See here [...] Also: You can hear the zoom and focus on videos, and it often has focus issues during a video.

Reviews.Title: Purchased as a Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: dr_sova
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my dad this past Christmas.  I own a Nikon L100 12.1 mpx that I purchased a couple years ago.  My dad's retired, not great with technology but it was easy to teach him how to use this camera.  His last camera used 35mm film and I think it's 12 years old now, only about half a role of film will develop, so he was in need of a new one.  The interface is identical to the L100 so I knew how to use it right out of the box.  The photo quality is great, I've taken some photos and video at its maximum zoom and they all turned out great.  It's well built from aluminum and is sure to last for years, after all it is a Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix camera
Reviews.Author: hospice rn
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. Very light weight. The zoom and the 16 megapixels are what made me choose this product. I am having so much fun with it.

Reviews.Title: Nice!!!
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use and perfect for the kinds of photos that I intend to take...love the zoom and video

Reviews.Title: Wonderful gift!
Reviews.Author: Joyce Nutter
Reviews.Content: My son loved it! Very sharp pictures and good features. A wonderful gift for anyone who enjoys taking pictures and making memories.

Reviews.Title: very good!!!
Reviews.Author: Mark Chiang
Reviews.Content: Very good caremar, but the night view is just so so. it still very good for me. take this, you can go out freely.

Reviews.Title: S9300 camera
Reviews.Author: Karl
Reviews.Content: Again it was a Christmas present to myself, Have not used it yet. It was shipped on time packaged well and looks good until I see how the pictures come out I will not be able to be more forthcoming then that. My nieces have several of the cameras in the Coolpix series and are very happy with them I see no reason to believe I will be less happy with mine, it is just the instruction manual is so thick, it may be awhile before I get thru it to take any pictures.

Reviews.Title: First impressions.
Reviews.Author: Victor
Reviews.Content: Overall impression is very positive. Pictures seem to be very colorful and sharp. Have not checked them on bigger screen yet, though. Zoom is good, although focusing at the max zoom is slow/unreliable.Some minor details that felt wrong are the position of the flash (I'm used to holding the camera with my left hand and the flash tries to pop up from underneath of my left index finger now), a little too long of a delay between pressing the video record button and actually starting/stopping video recording, and a little too long time between shots (I guess saving those 16 MPixel pics takes too long).

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the size
Reviews.Author: Curtis Caldwell
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera for its size.  Good zoom and takes excellent pictures, even in low light.  Had purchased an S8200 last year, but had to replace it (was lost) and found tha the S9300 was even better.

Reviews.Title: Good price for Good camera
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: At the Gold box price deal it is a good purchase. Do not like the confusing menu setting under "effect". Anti-vibration functonality could be better. Rest is OK and pictures are nice. Like the optical zoom capability very much.
