Normally use a EOS 5D semi-professional camera with 12 MP, but this 16MP makes nice walking around shots if you do not want to carry the 10 pound camera and lenses with you.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: Great camera until someone stole it after I had it for only a week :(. I bought the S8600 thinking it was the same but the 9300 was much better.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S9200 Camera
Reviews.Author: Wilma Flintstone
Reviews.Content: This camera takes crisp images and the telephoto lens images are nice too.The only think I don't care for is the on off button is so teeny.

Reviews.Title: not as good as my Kodak Z950
Reviews.Author: candy
Reviews.Content: bought this after many review searches to replace my Kodak Z950, due to pricing and reviews.  Two things I don't like about this is that to take successive pics there is a delay so taking action shots is a pain.  The auto focus isn't immediate or as quick as i'd like it to be anyhow. Using the power button is slow too.  Not sure about much else yet...picture quality seems to be good.  More later...

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix
Reviews.Author: Beverly
Reviews.Content: I've finally got a camera I can use.  I'm not good with the new digital cameras because of all the differentinstruction but I can use this one.  sure glad I ordered it.

Reviews.Title: nikon s9200
Reviews.Author: wynn
Reviews.Content: it is as good as s 9300 if you don't need gps.Good camera for the price.I like it very much

Reviews.Title: Great pictures in a compact cammera
Reviews.Author: Zeta2005
Reviews.Content: Excellent zoom and 16 mp. A comfortable choice for those who don't want to carry a heavy reflex cammera. Obvously is not the same, but is more than enuff to take family pictures.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera !
Reviews.Author: Aunshuman Ghosh
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a point and shoot camera for a while. This replaced by old Cannon and is giving me amazing results. Very nice clarity and lot of different scene options (i have used snow, sunset, landscape etc.). Panaromic option works very well and the best part - perfect clicks in the night both outside and inside the house. great buy...would surely recommend

Reviews.Title: Nikon
Reviews.Author: miguel perez vega
Reviews.Content: excellent product camera'm still learning to use very good resolution beautiful photos, I recommend the product meets the expectations thanks

Reviews.Title: Perfect size and very rugged.
Reviews.Author: Donald V. Rogers
Reviews.Content: Slips into my shirt pocket easily, making it easy to keep handy for that sudden picture opportunity. I was taking pictures of our new puppy chasing the ball, when unnoticed by me it must have slid out of my pocket onto the ground. I didn't find it until the next day. After carefully brushing the dirt and sand off, it started up just fine, and still takes great pictures. I now hook the lanyard through a button when exercising with the dog.

Reviews.Title: Made a great gift for my dad!
Reviews.Author: Carol Conner
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. Screen is large and clear. We haven't printed pictures yet, but so far we are happy with out purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great for a PHD (push here dummy) or more advanced user
Reviews.Author: Melanie
Reviews.Content: I am the PHD taker and my husband loves to work with all of the settings.  Great for the both of us.  And it is compact enough to go in my husbands's pocket, or in my smaller travel bag.  Wouldn't be without it.  We upgraded from the S9100 and there was little additional learning curve.  Love It!

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly if the person operating it and has gone through the manual
Reviews.Author: Dhawal
Reviews.Content: This camera is excellent and all the reviews on external website of this camera not being good at night is completely wrong. This would be the case for anyone using this camera without reading the manual especially the night mode. For people getting the blurry images( not sharp) images at night please read the manual on how to use the camera. The HDR functionality also works flawless.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix camera
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with the photo quality! Only negative is the door to the battery and card seems like it could break easily. Just know to be careful with it - best quality photos of any other camera we have had! Love it!

Reviews.Title: COOLPIX S9200 CAMERA
Reviews.Author: macy
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera.  A lot to learn but the complete manual is online and 244 pages.  Takes great pictures.I would recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: You just can't beat a Nikon
Reviews.Author: STEPHANIE A. PARRISH
Reviews.Content: For the money, this is the best camera I have ever owned. It's a Nikon, you can not go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Good Relation Price-Quality
Reviews.Author: Fernando Miranda
Reviews.Content: Probably there's another with similar relationship price-quality, but i'm satisfied with this one. It's just what i need right now.

Reviews.Title: I like it but had some problems
Reviews.Author: Sergio Alejandro Osorio Ramírez
Reviews.Content: The image quality is great, the zoom is amazing.Bad points: Battery duration is not as I expected, also sometimes I have to press more than two times the play button to change to this mode.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: CARLOS GARANTON
Reviews.Content: I recommend this product. I like it bacause is a very beautifull and a ver y confortable a a a

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S9200
Reviews.Author: J. Farren
Reviews.Content: I have used the camera several times in various situations and it has delivered high quality pics everytime. It is easy to use and easy to carry around. I'm not an expert on compact digital cameras but I like this one.

Reviews.Title: Manuals
Reviews.Author: John Stewart
Reviews.Content: I wish I had a printed manual as I do not particularly like read on the computer for some reason.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Katrina
Reviews.Content: This camera is a very nice camera. The picture and video quality is great. I would definitely recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Buen producto.
Reviews.Author: Paco Velásquez
Reviews.Content: Cumplio todas mis expectativas, la camara llego tal y com dice en el anuncio.Comparado con la coolpix 9100, tiene mejoers pretaciones.Saludos.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Lisa Austin
Reviews.Content: I got it on Cyber Monday at a TERRIFIC price. Best camera I've ever had. Sounds like some people just got "lemons" or should have paid more for an even better camera.I think this is solid. Takes great pics, easy to use. Love the close-up macro lens.And on my Mac I like that I don't have to drag to trash to eject it as usb. I can just unplug it without getting that annoying alert message.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Hector Nicanor
Reviews.Content: Very good quality, in my hand didn't feel cheap at all, it has a lot of options available for take good photos. The package was ok, the only cons I give is unable of take raw photos and the nikon software for mac that is very very hard to make it work at first run.In general is a very good product for a good price.

Reviews.Title: Small, loaded piece of quality equipment.
Reviews.Author: Donald Strei
Reviews.Content: It is surprising that this camera has managed to run all its complex features in a small case, and it seems to do that well.  The prices of the same unit elsewhere seem to be consistently about 20% higher, and do not offer free shipping.

Reviews.Title: Basic, full function point and shoot
Reviews.Author: kevin mckinney
Reviews.Content: What you see is what you get. Nothing fancy, just a solid, web capable camera. I use it around my restaurant for guests, and for team member performance recording.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Beth Callen
Reviews.Content: I chose this product because it was half off and I desperately wanted a digital camera because mine got broken. The only thing I'm not overly thrilled about is how long it takes to start up once you turn it on. But it's a big step up from my older Nikon camera. It's awesome and makes me very happy!

Reviews.Title: very good product
Reviews.Author: Danny
Reviews.Content: this is a very good product,it gives me the high quality pictures ,no matter day or night.and it has many functions

Reviews.Title: One of the best!
Reviews.Author: D Garvin
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!  It's one of the best I have ever owned.  Purchased it to take photos to sell on eBay.  Got a great deal!  Super fast shipment too!  What more could you want??

Reviews.Title: excellent compact
Reviews.Author: SURESH N RAO
Reviews.Content: i have had several SLR's and digital compacts. this is my first nikon. i was amazed at the quietness of the shutter, the speed of saving to file and resolution of the pictures. the three things that have bugged me in the past. an excellent purchase. thanks Nikon and thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great Point and Click
Reviews.Author: Michael Watson "mw"
Reviews.Content: Does what we need it to do.  Although It takes a while to figure out what options to select, once set up the fun begins.  Picture transfer to a PC is easy - do not need the vendor's software.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Great deal on a great camera. I would buy again.  Love Nikon products.  Love the 360 panorama feature and HD video.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Irvin A. Tate
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a digital compact camera that has great features.Better mp and better zoom over my old camera.

Reviews.Title: The camera is good.
Reviews.Author: Seth S. Johnston
Reviews.Content: The auto focus is a bit soft. As I have the possibility to use Photoshop/PaintShopPro software, I can overcome some of the shortcomings of the camera, but it was a fair deal for the price. My much older Sony was getting a bit long in the tooth.

Reviews.Title: Flash location
Reviews.Author: Jdub "Jdub"
Reviews.Content: Don't like the placement of the popup flash.  Located where you naturally place your finger to take pictures.  I am probably better suited to purchase something like this at the store where I can try before I buyLots of features I probably won't use ....really just wanted simple point and shoot

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S9200  1MP
Reviews.Author: sandy thompson
Reviews.Content: Easy use do not need a rocket scientist, fits right in the hand.,  It is the right camera for me!  Thanks

Reviews.Title: Coolpix camera
Reviews.Author: Ms Lisa
Reviews.Content: Super fast, really nice camera. Lots of features I haven't tried yet. I think it will work well for fast action shots

Reviews.Title: nice overall
Reviews.Author: ad1321
Reviews.Content: the camera shoots quickly except when dark it takes a little while sometimes and longer the more it is zoomed in. The features are easy to use. The annoying thing is nikon packaged it with the photo software view nx2 which apparently is not compatable with the s9200 but only the s9300 which does not make sense first of all because they are the same camera minus the gps. When I plugged my camera in at first I thought my computer had not installed it correctly or was not detecting my camera, but it worked in iphoto and there was no errors during install. I went to the nikon site which is where I found the camera was not compatible with the software so dont plan on using it. THANKS NIKON......

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Renee Gallagher
Reviews.Content: Great pocket camera. Only drawback is the time it takes for camera to be ready to take the second shot. Otherwise, perfect.

Reviews.Title: broke after 6 months
Reviews.Author: John B. Wolter
Reviews.Content: new battery and charged battery wouldn't keep the camera running to take pictures.  Good thing it is still covered by warranty.  now if Nikon would only get the return paperwork sent out so I could get it repaired...it's been 2 weeks since I called them!

Reviews.Title: Bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: Pranav Kulkarni "PK"
Reviews.Content: the camera is small, smart, takes good pictures. one of the best camera's user 200 bucks. I love nikon - hate canon and this is the best nikon available under $200

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: rgralla
Reviews.Content: Many features.  Fairly good lens, but some vignetting especially at telephoto settings.  Feels well made; small but somewhat heavy.  Good display. HD movie works well.  I do not miss the lack of the GPS in any way.  I would purchase this again, given that it comes at a good price.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Myrriah
Reviews.Content: Focus is terrible. Half the photos that I took for my sister's wedding came out awful.When you are taking a photo, the flash pops up and interrupts the photo, messing it up.The automatic filter is cool, but the subject has to be perfectly still for the photo to come out well.The first night I used it, the lens cap was not closing properly. I almost had to send it back.Overall, I'm disappointed. I don't recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Tara Fisher
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera that would take great pictures, without having to pay hundreds of dollars for it.  This is that camera!  I love how clear and sharp the images are.  I also have really enjoyed the Smart Scene feature.

Reviews.Title: Just as advertized
Reviews.Author: Marc A Abelanet
Reviews.Content: Already sold on this camera: Replacing an S9100 that I broke, the S9200 is similar enough that I immediately knew how to use it. The menus are also easier to navigate which is a big plus. More pixels and sharper photos. Altogether a very good camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Nilesh Mune
Reviews.Content: Its a good camera to take pics in good daylight. More features like manual mode can make it a good camera.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Ariel

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!

The only down side is the flash area on the camera which is really annoying and also i paid for gift wrapping but it came in just the normal box and wasn't even sealed but that doesn't deserve any bad review on the product itself.

Reviews.Content: It's a small camera but with the great qualities of Nikkon: simplicity and excellent pictures. This camera has excellent sensitivity to light and a very good zoom. It is an excellent camera for trips and family vacations.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: ArtBasics
Reviews.Content: You'll Love it! Features totally exceed expectations. Macro to telephoto. This work for me as a pro. The HD video alone can be paused at ant moment for a solid 8" X 10" photo. Security cameras should be using this technology.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S9300 Camera
Reviews.Author: SF "SF"
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera based upon a relative's recommendation.  Wonderful technology.  The zoom is fantastic.  The HD pictures are crystal clear.  Easy to operate, and small enough to carry anywhere. We recommend this version of camera to anyone who wants to easily take professional quality pics at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Not the best camera
Reviews.Author: UserFriendly
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my partner as a Christmas gift. I would have sent it back but we missed the return deadline. My partner is a professional photographer and she wanted a simple point and shoot with some fun options. I thought I had found the perfect camera for her. The settings are great, lots of options. The depth of images is fantastic. Now the bad news... the flash is on the top right side of the camera. The spot where you traditionally hold the camera and you inadvertently hold the flash down. We could get over that though. She doesn't use the flash often, but still. Camera design is important. The bigger issue is that it shuts down or freezes A LOT! She told me one setting in particular will automatically freeze the camera every single time. Other times it decides it doesn't want to take anymore pictures and completely shuts down. When it works, yay! When it doesn't, well you know. On the other hand I bought my step-daughter a Cannon and that thing just keeps going and going. Like all of our other Cannons.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Cookpix S9200
Reviews.Author: Edward J. Trerotola
Reviews.Content: The Flash is in the wrong position. Must people have their finger covering the flash  when they hold. the camera to shoot. The on/off button is too small and too recessed.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera I've ever had.
Reviews.Author: D. Jow "Dani Jow"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after having another point and shoot for 3 years and it needed to be updated. I did a lot of research on various point and shoot cameras, and finally decided on this one. This product has an incredible value for its quality and pictures it takes. I am very impressed by the camera overall, and it's zoom is remarkable. I love all the effects it has, especially the color focus to create very artsy photos with a touch of a button. The sports mode and continuous shoot mode are also very handy. Overall, I would highly recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a new camera.

Reviews.Title: A great camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Letendre
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our honeymoon trip to Germany. the GPS function was a great factor that lead us to this model. The fact that if we can not remember where the picture was taken we can now figure out, was this Hannover, or Wolfsburg, or anywhere else.he pictures are clear and the modes make it easy to pick the right settings.Yes there is even a food setting for all those people who love to take pictures of their food (and yes we are those people, about 1/3 of all the pictures we had from Germany were of the food we ate there)

Reviews.Title: muy buena
Reviews.Author: jose maria
Reviews.Content: muy buena, un poco sensible al movimiento,  algo lenta en modo automatico y enfoque. por lo demas muy buena y accesible

Reviews.Title: Battery was damaged already for one used
Reviews.Author: Feliciano Marfil
Reviews.Content: I was very happy when I received my new Nikon Cool pix S9300, but when the battery was exhausted, it never charge anymore I check the battery , and I found out that it might be damaged already when the Amazon send the Item to me.. so I don't know yet if Amazon will send me another battery because I cannot use my camera anymore I need to but another battery...

Reviews.Title: Best camera that I've ever had
Reviews.Author: Moki Chez
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera. I got it a month and a half ago and I've taken over one thousand shots so far. I and many others on Facebook, Flickr and Google Plus are impressed with the beauty and colors of the shots! Some reviewers have been complaining of this or that and I say if the camera has certain limitations then learn to work within those limitations. It's 16 megapixels, higher then all others in this class that I've seen and the 18x zoom is unmatched also. I bought a wide angle lens where a metal ring is adhered to the outer rim of the zoom lens then the wide angle lens is attached magnetically to get an even more panoramic shot. If you can't take excellent pics with this camera you're not trying hard enough! I also use a tripod, I got a portable type with a sling I rigged up to carry with me and a tabletop style and also one with wrap around, bendable legs to attach it to poles and rails ect. making it all the more versatile. The quality of the pics is so high that minimal post production work needs to be done in Photoshop but they can be enhanced also but really for most folks Photoshop would not even be needed. The more familiar that I get with the features and settings the more I like it and the more I can do with it. I say get it and I don't see why you would be disappointed unless you are too picky or expect too much and don't accept it for what it is, which I think is a great camera with exceptional technology, go for it and get one. I have not brought any images in yet to get printed and framed up but if and when I do they will look great hanging on the wall.

Reviews.Title: nikon s9200 terrible
Reviews.Author: la
Reviews.Content: this is the worst camera. slow ,hard to take clear pictures. nikon should take this camera and put it where the sun don't shine.

Reviews.Title: The camera I was looking for
Reviews.Author: A. Pena
Reviews.Content: I haven't tried every feature but what I have tried met expectations. Good point and shoot for less than 200 smackers.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Joshua O. Betz "indy josh"
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use and has useful features such as the continuous shoot, especially if you have kids that don't look at the camera. I would buy it again.JB

Reviews.Title: great pocket zoom camera
Reviews.Author: Jack W. Walker
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to my spouse. She has enjoyed it and loves the zoom lens.  It fits an existing camera case and is very easy to use. Great camera for the price and intended use.

Reviews.Title: Nikon review
Reviews.Author: Shirley Gilliland
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with the camera. Easy to use, although the battery has to be recharged more than my last Olympus.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix Camera S9300 Review

Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the Coolpix 9300.  For a small camera with a wide 18x zoom it has performed as I expected it to.  Instructions to use the camera are very easy to use.  I just wrote down notes from the instructions and before long I had the camera performing as it should.

Reviews.Title: Did not receive what was promised !
Reviews.Author: Ed Sherman
Reviews.Content: The item description says that "in the box" it comes with a "Coolpix black leather case." THIS IS A LIE!  Mine did not come with a case. My wife bought an s4300 that DID come with a case, but I did not receive one. Beware of online descriptions.

Reviews.Title: Video's are corrupted it the battery dies while you are shooting.
Reviews.Author: Charles M. Adams "M Adams"
Reviews.Content: I found out the hard way about this camera and it HD video. It tried to shoot my child's soccer games and at 29 minutes it just stops.  When the battery dies. Not a problem right. You just replace with a fresh battery and start shooting again. However when you get home you will find that none of the videos will play if the battery dies or you turn the camera off without stopping the video first and waiting about 2 minutes before you turn the camera off. The reason for this is that the video is saved in an Apple .MOV file which is a wrapper around a audio and video stream.  If the battery dies while you are recording or you forget and turn the camera off without first stopping the video and waiting for the software to create the wrapper with all the metadata to finish and be written around the file then your record video .MOV file wrapper is corrupted and the file is worthless and will not play.  About half of my soccer videos will not play.  There is not any software on the market to fix this corrupted file and recreate the .MOV file wrapper.  Nikon does not support it with repair software to fix your corrupted .MOV  file.  Never buy this camera for the HD video.  It is OK for still pictures.  It will leave you angry and pissed once you lose a few of your precious videos.  Also it will stop when the video file size reaches 3,156,556  KB exactly 29 minutes.  They fail to mention that anywhere in the literature. It will also become over heated if you are shooting a game in the sun and just stop.

What a mistake!Clarity of pictures were unpredictable, blurry, washed out, not good color.The menu wheel turns so freely, with a slight bump it will change to another mode.The zoom pictures are poor quality too.I'm totally disappointed! My smartphone took better photos compared to this camera.The pop out flash is super annoying. They put it right were you hold the camera.RETURNING IT!!!!!!

I'm thinking it can afford to let me down a little and still earn 5 stars because of the price.Multiple letdowns:  biggest being I can't take good pictures with it.  My 6 year old Canon Elph takes much clearer pictures with ease and has a nice metal case.  second, it's rather larger to slip into a pocket and go type situation.  I bought to take pictures of experiments in the laboratory, but it's just too bulky to carry.  Lastly the case does not seem very durable, so drop would likely cause pretty severe damage, where as my Canon has survived a few drops over the years.Next time I'll remember the "you get what you pay for" mantra, methinks

The battery drains out very fast, not sure problem with the battery or camera consumes a lot of power.5. When you use zoom-on zoom out, the lens goes in and out and makes a noise, not a very smooth transition, as if its not going to last many days

Reviews.Title: Not yet sure, but will give another update
Reviews.Author: zuzyq
Reviews.Content: I posted this on questions, but thought I would post this as well.  I think Amazon should know as well."Hey anyone out there buy this 9200 Nikon Coolpix? Full HD 1080p/black? Well I had some issues with uploading and could see them on the NXr2 but they would not upload to computer, snapfish, windows or otherwise. So I called customer service they said I could only use certain SD cards brand names about 4 of them. They suggested I take them to some place like Walmart to get them uploaded. ? Wow, Really? I have never in my life had a problem like this before. Any suggests out there?Ok, I went to Nikon.com and this is the link I have for that... So, in order to save anyone else any grief, and as suggested on the Amazon site to buy Transcend SD card... it will not work, I have spent several unnecessary hours trying to figure this all out, because you will not get your pictures uploaded otherwise, Crazy, Yes, this is what I thought.. http://support.nikonusa.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/17756/~/approved-memory-cards---coolpix-s9300-%2F-s9200

Reviews.Title: A Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: M. Christie
Reviews.Content: For years I used an SLR, had a variety of lenses, and took some specialized photos.  Never thought I would find in a small camera the ability to capture such vivid colors and one which had so many features.  There are settings for a number of scenarios, such as night pictures, fireworks, portraits, etc. which enhance any photos in those categories.  I wish electronic items came with the "old fashioned" instruction book, but they don't anymore, so I did have to print out about 79 pages from the computer.  Wonderful closeup and distance features.  A number of friends have complemented me on my photos and asked for the camera brand and model.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, advanced features

Reviews.Content: I love this camera so much that I actually bought the same one (this one in silver) for my mom.  She loves it as much as I do.  The rechargeable battery is essential, and the functions are easy enough even for her to figure out.  The pictures are crystal clear, and there is an excellent zoom.  Unless you want to spend a lot more money ($350+), I find it unlikely that you'll find a camera that can beat this one.  I highly recommend it!

I bought it a couple of months ago after my camera crashed and had to wait until a friend brought the camera in March to Uganda, East Africa where I live. I have had it about a week and love it. It has everything I was looking for and more. It is a great camera for taking photos of the children that I work with and love.

She barely knows how to turn the laptop on, so what every I select must be user friendly, but I still strive for the quality near professional whistles and bells when it comes to cameras.For a camera that has many features of a typical SLR type camera, it really seems to be among the best I've looked at, and how can you go wrong with a Nikon!Oh and at a great price too!~!!!

It doesn't have quite the resolution of my Nikon D5100 but it's close and more than adequate for a camera that is easy for my wife to carry in her purse.  I've used it a number of time when it was the only camera we had with us and have always been pleased with the pictures we took with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Sin Problema Recepcion del Articulo
Reviews.Author: Cristian
Reviews.Content: El producto fue entregado sin inconveniente de acuerdo a las especificaciones publicadas... se cumplio plazos de entrega... recomendado... El producto fue entregado sin inconveniente de acuerdo a las especificaciones publicadas... se cumplio plazos de entrega... recomendado...

Reviews.Title: Very dissapointed
Reviews.Author: j
Reviews.Content: I have owned similar cameras by Sony and Canon.  My Nikon S9200 arrived with glitches that Nikon claimed were caused by me when sent to them for warranty repair.  Following repair (not covered by warranty) the original condition was not fully resolved, and other problems became evident.  Maybe mine was a lemon, but without further recourse I will never know.- Super "twitchy" function wheel risks erasing entire memory card.- Color inaccuracies that do not lend themselves well to correction- The worst focus I have had ... even from less expensive cameras.On the positive side, night video was surprizingly good.  Some individual pics were excellent, but only in the most optimal situations.I have returned to Canon with the SX260 ... and glad to be back.I plan on giving the Nikon S9200 to some kid as a starter camera.  On auto mode it should give someone some fun.

Reviews.Title: Nicely designed camera
Reviews.Author: Sande Stuff
Reviews.Content: Our son took a trip to Maui and took some really nice shots with this camera. He really appreciated the compact size for traveling and was impressed with the easy to find preset features. My wife and I will be taking this camera on a cruise and I think the compact size will be perfect for the onshore excursions without attracting attention to bulky large camera bags that scream "Tourist"!

Reviews.Title: Gift of Vision
Reviews.Author: bookwormColleen "Colleen"
Reviews.Content: My daughter and son both were grateful for the gift I made to each them of this camera. Their happiness made me happy, as they are a bit more by technology spoiled than I. However, I have asked if I could use It!

Reviews.Title: Why no RAW!
Reviews.Author: Ken Prigg
Reviews.Content: A compact camera with good zoom range, glass lens, vibration reduction and other features will not find space as backup in a advanced amateur or pros backpack without RAW capability.

Reviews.Title: First Nikon, VERY UNHAPPY - SHORT BATTERY LIFE
Reviews.Author: Tyler O Ballou
Reviews.Content: Pros:GPS feature available18x ZoomCons:Battery lifeTurning GPS on cuts battery life by at least 1/3Camera often takes blurry shotsSlow to focusDoesn't like to charge via PCI am an avid photographer of my travels and up until recently had been using an old 7MP Canon Point and Shoot camera with only 3x zoom from 2007, in conjunction with my DSLR's to take photos of my travels.Since newer cameras have a LOT better zoom and more features, including GPS, I decided to upgrade my point and shoot.I researched and came upon the Nikon S9300.  It seemed to have all the features I wanted.  Yeah!Then I got it out in the real world for the first time.  WOW, disappointing is all I can say.I was used to my old camera going through 600 shots in 8+ hours and filling up the memory card before it EVER lost battery power.This one, I got around 230 shots into a trip to a theme park and not even 2.5 hours into the park, where I started to take photo's with a FULLY charged battery, the battery died.I was shocked!!!I had the GPS on, and figured that was what was draining the battery.  So the next day, after charging all night long, I took it back out, without the GPS or any other features on.This time it lasted around 4 hours and I got over 380 shots.  Not bad, but still nothing close to the 8+ hours and over 600 shots I used to get.Now, a lot of you might be saying, wow, that's great, however I have to compare it to both my old one, and my DSLRs (Not Nikon's).  The DSLR's (One from 2007, one from 2012) get in upwards of 2-3000 (Thousand, not a typo) shots (10 & 16MP respectively), and I've only once run out of battery power (Shooting over 3000 shots in less than 2 hours).Now, yes the DSLR has a larger battery, but it also has GPS on all the time.I find this Nikon is SERIOUSLY under powered.Just to compare, my friend has a S6300, and can take more shots and over an entire day this camera.KEEP LOOKING, and make sure to look at the battery life.A helpful hint, review how many shots you take on average, not just the one's you keep, but ALL the photos, then determine if the camera has the battery life you want, or plan on buying more battery's and an extra external charger.

Reviews.Title: PIECE O' JUNIK!!!!
Reviews.Author: eddep
Reviews.Content: After buying it, charged it, then played around with the camera some, then set it on a shelf where it sat for about 2 months. I then went to use it, and it wouldn't turn on, wouldn't charge, nothing. After simply sitting on a shelf.... I've heard comments for some time now that Nikon quality isn't nearly what it used to be, has really faltered, and this proves that to me. I bot a Panasonic ZS19 which has worked, takes beautiful hi-fi images, and is fairly intuitive. FORGET NIKON cameras, just overpriced trash!! I had 2 Canons that lasted for years, and now this Panasonic. I'll stick with them....

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Carlos Roberto Ortiz
Reviews.Content: excelente producto estoy satisfecho con el y con el tiempo de entrega del mismo, lo recomiendo a todos los compradores

Reviews.Title: Product cheap and good
Reviews.Author: manmohan negi
Reviews.Content: Cons :Full HD video.cheapgood picture qualitysleek and handyPros:Position of flashtakes time in starting.

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD FOR ME SO FAR
Reviews.Author: Pei-Tzu Chen
Reviews.Content: I just receive it. So far so good.But I still wait for the memory card to come.I can try more pictures during the night time.

Reviews.Title: Trip of a lifetime
Reviews.Author: Gary A. Griswell "Griz"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife for her trip to the Holy Land.  It was very difficult to find a red one.  But it was delivered and was just as we expected.  She is now on her trip and I look forward to seeing the memories she is able to record.

Reviews.Title: It's a good camera, but...
Reviews.Author: Margaret C
Reviews.Content: I have been using Nikon Coolpix cameras for a few years now.  They take very good pictures, are compact to carry, and...When I couldn't find mine before we took a trip to Thailand, I ordered this one.  It arrived (on time, etc); and when I opened it up to get it out and set it up, I discovered that it has a battery pack with wall charger.  One of the main reasons I liked my Cookpix cameras was that they used AA batteries, and I could take them anywhere.  I gave this one to my sister, and bought a different Coolpix - one that uses AA batteries.

Reviews.Title: Difficult to operate
Reviews.Author: James Allan "Creative Director Ad Agency"
Reviews.Content: I'm a pro photographer for the past 25 years using only Nikon equipment.  This is not Nikon quality it has very confusing operational system and there are lots of cheap little plastic parts that are certain to break with any amount of use.  Lots of unnecessary  doo dads that can drive you crazy. Also trying to focus or frame something witha jiggling little tv screen is just stupid.  I'm totally disppointed Nikon would market this.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: caloe
Reviews.Content: It is easy to set up, produces good pictures. I like the movie capability, I use it to make short clips at family reunions.Reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Angeldawn
Reviews.Content: This camera is very advanced for my skills but if you are into all the bells and whistles this is it at an affordable price

Reviews.Title: great capability
Reviews.Author: Mary C Andrews
Reviews.Content: The benefit of small size and low weight with the capability of a much bigger camera makes this perfect for traveling light.

Reviews.Title: Great feature set, bad implementation.
Reviews.Author: Tony V.
Reviews.Content: IT comes with some nifty effects and a great zoom with a nice wide angle lens however the image stabilization doesnt work and the camera gives you absolutely no control over shutter speed or aperture. everything is based on an "automatic" setting with the camera sensors doing the work. also even in a very well lit room the camera attempts to use the flash unless you disable it. the pictures constantly come out blurry even when using a tripod and half pressing the shutter for focus. i know now why it was only $150. i'll stick with my canon sx 500. It gives me true manual control, a better zoom, and amazing image stabilization. i would urge all of you to pass on the nikon s9200.

Reviews.Title: I bought this online
Reviews.Author: P. Acosta "Sirwolfgang"
Reviews.Content: You can  this very same camera direct from NIKON  for $99.00.  I have read many sad things about it and equal good. I hope it is a good camera.  The joke is the SRP of $299.00.  I hope mine isn't radioactive.
